59b3(mdo sde): nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/ /khye'u de le lo can/ mchog tu le lo che ba zhig ste/ khri la nyal zhing khri las ldang du mi btub nas pha ma gnyis kyis de
59b4(mdo sde): la dris pa/ bu/ khyod la lus kyi nad dam/ sems kyi gdung ba 'ga' lta yod dam zhes byas nas de le lo'i dbang gis de dag la cung zad kyang smrar mi btub nas pha
59b5(mdo sde): ma gnyis kyis de sman pa la bstan na/ sman pa na re/ 'di la lus kyi nad kyang ci yang med la/ sems kyi gdung ba yang ci yang med kyi/ le lo kho nas khri las ldang du
59b6(mdo sde): mi btub par zad do/ /zhes zer ro/ /de nas de la pha ma gnyis kyis lan mang du bsgo ste/ de ltar ma byed cig /khyod 'di ltar 'dug pas bde ba thob par mi nus so/ /
59b7(mdo sde): mi rnams nye bar 'tsho ba ni/ sgrub phod pa'i 'bras bu yin no/ /zhes lan mang du brtun kyang de bslang ma nus so/ /de nas phyi zhig na pha ma gnyis kyi sems skyes pa/
60a1(mdo sde): yon gnas dag spyan drangs la bshos gsol na/ de dag mthong na zhe sa bskyed de ldang yang srid do snyam nas de dag gis ston pa drug
60a2(mdo sde): g.yar drangs te zan byin nas khye'u des de dag mthong yang ma langs so/ /des na khyim bdag gis bsam pa/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni/ bsod nams can che bar grags pa/
60a3(mdo sde): tshig btsan pa yin pas na/ khye'u 'dis de mthong na zhe sa bskyed de ldang bar 'gyur yang srid do snyam nas des phyi nyin sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun
60a4(mdo sde): khyim du spyan drangs te/ de nyid kyi nub mo bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang po sbyar nas nang par sngar langs te gdan bshams nas chu ra bkang ste bzhag nas
60a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la 'phrin gyis gdugs tshong bskul ba/ btsun pa gdugs tshod la bab ste bshos gsol lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab
60a6(mdo sde): par dgongs te gshegs su gsol zhes bskul to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro chos gos dang sham thabs gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas dge slong mang pos
60a7(mdo sde): z ham ring byas te dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas khyim bdag de'i bkad sa ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams
60b1(mdo sde): pa la bzhugs so/ /de nas khye'u des thag ring po zhig nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mdzes shing yid du 'thad la dbang po zhi ba/ thugs mchog tu dul ba dang rnam par zhi ba
60b2(mdo sde): dang ldan pa/ gser gyi mchod sdong ltar dpal 'bar bar mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang de gus par bsgrims pa'i shugs kyis langs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song
60b3(mdo sde): s te phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te pha ma gnyis dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams bad bar bzhugs
60b4(mdo sde): par rig nas rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang pos tshim par byas te ci bzhed pa bstabs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol zin te
60b5(mdo sde): gsang sder ni/ gyu/ phyag ni/ bcabs par rig nas stan chas dma' ba dag blangs te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan
60b6(mdo sde): 'das kyis khye'u de la brtson 'grus kyi bsngags pa brjod de/ bu/ brtson 'grus kyis ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bka'
60b7(mdo sde): stsal to| |de nas khye'u des bsam pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa 'di ni/ bzang ste/ bdag gi brtson 'grus zhan pas bla ma'i khyad par thob par mi nus kyi/
61a1(mdo sde): ma la bdag gis rgya mtsho'i nang du 'gro ba bsgrubs la sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la bkur bsti bya'o snyam nas rgya mtsho'i nang du 'gro
61a2(mdo sde): ba'i zod khyer te rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du zhugs nas des rin po che'i gling du 'gro ba'i don du bsgrubs te rgya mtsho'i gru po che'i don grub nas mnyan du yod par 'ongs te/ des sangs
61a3(mdo sde): r gyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zla ba gsum du spyan drangs nas yo byad thams cad sbyar te sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la zla ba gsum gyi bar
61a4(mdo sde): d u yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas nas tha ma'i nyin par sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa gsol nas bcom ldan
61a5(mdo sde): 'das lan bza' 'bum ri ba phul lo/ /dge slong gzhan dag la yang re re la ras zung re phul nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam
61a6(mdo sde): btab ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na bdag 'jig rten long ba/ 'dren pa med pa/ ston pa med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig
61a7(mdo sde): pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas
61b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das su gyur cig ces byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u de la bka' stsal pa/ khye'u/ legs so/ /legs so/ /khye'u/ khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus
61b2(mdo sde): na 'jig rten long pa/ 'dren pa med pa/ ston pa med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde
61b3(mdo sde): bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das stobs dang
61b4(mdo sde): brtson 'grus kyi rtsal dang ldan pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes gsungs so// //mgon med zas sbyin zhes bya ba ni/ gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te de'i tshe mnyan du
61b5(mdo sde): yod pa na bram ze dbul po 'tsho bas phongs pa zhig gnas te/ de yang gso ba mang zhing g.yog 'khor mang ba zhig ste/ des bsam pa/ bdag gis phyug po gang zhig la brten
61b6(mdo sde): te 'tsho ba btsal bar bya snyam mo/ /de nas des bsam pa/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ni/ snying rje can/ sbyin pa la sred pa yin te/ des ni/ bdag la dgos pa thams
61b7(mdo sde): cad kyis sdud par nus so snyam mo/ /de nas de'i grib ma dang ma 'bral ba bzhin du de'i phyi bzhin 'brang ngo / /de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis 'phrigs nas dris pa/
62a1(mdo sde): bram ze| khyod nga la rag las pa ci yod| bram zes smras pa/ khyim bdag /rag ci yang las te/ khyod la brten nas 'tsho ba btsal
62a2(mdo sde): bar 'dod do/ /de nas de thos ma thag tu khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis de'i 'tshog chas thams cad sbyor ba la zhugs so/ /de nas phyi zhig na de yis khyim bdag
62a3(mdo sde): mgon med zas sbyin dang lhan cig tu rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ngo / /khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi lugs kyis na/ nyin gcig bzhin du g.yog 'khor
62a4(mdo sde): lnga brgya dang rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'gro zhing phyag dar byed do/ /de nas phyi zhig na de'i bya ba zhig byung nas des bram ze de mngags te/ deng khyod kyis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi
62a5(mdo sde): tshal du phyag dar gyis shig ces byas nas khyim bdag de song ngo / /bram ze de yang rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi byi dor byed pa la zhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
62a6(mdo sde): dgongs pa/ bram ze 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par sems bskyed par 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
62a7(mdo sde): ci nas cung zad tsam zhig byi dor byas pa de tsam yang mi mngon pa de ltar byin gyis brlabs nas de des g.yengs te nyi ma rangs par thal bar gyur te/ de nas des bsam pa/ da ni/
62b1(mdo sde): bdag gis mnyan du yod par mi phyin no snyam nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal de nyid du dgong mal btab bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la
62b2(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' po/ song la rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi nang du bram ze de'i mal chos te khyod kyang de'i 'dabs su 'dug la/ des khyod la ci dris pa de'i lan khyod
62b3(mdo sde): kyis thob cig / gzhan yang dge slong rnams la bsgo ba/ dge slong dag gis dge ba bcab pa dang / sdig pa bshags pa'i tshul gyis gnas par gyis shig ces ngas
62b4(mdo sde): bstan mod kyi/ 'on kyang bram ze 'di la snying brtse ba'i phyir sus rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu thob kyang rung ste des rdzu 'phrul de lta bu ston cig ces gyis shig /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
62b5(mdo sde): bos gsol pa/ btsun pa/ de ltar 'tshal lo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos dge slong rnams la bsgo ba rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal 'di'i nang na bram ze 'dug pa
62b6(mdo sde): de'i mal chos la de'i 'dabs su 'khor cig ces bsgo'o/ /de nas de don 'dug pa la dge slong rnams rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gzhan dang / gzhan dag ston pa la zhugs so/ /
62b7(mdo sde): de nas bram ze des mthong nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la dris pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo/ 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar mthu che ba 'di dag su dag cig /tshe dang
63a1(mdo sde): ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyam thos rnams yin no/ /de nas bram ze des bsam pa/ slob pa rnams kyang 'di kho
63a2(mdo sde): na ltar phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan na/ dge sbyong gang ta ma lta ci smos te/ de ci 'dra ba zhig gu snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i sems bskyed
63a3(mdo sde): de| kye ma srod la ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhi nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs na legs so/ /nam phyed na ni/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs na legs so/ /
63a4(mdo sde): tho rangs na ni/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa nga la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs na legs so snyam du dgongs so/ /de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs bskyed pa'i 'phral
63a5(mdo sde): 'phral du rgyal po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs so/ /de nas bram ze des mthong
63a6(mdo sde): nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la dris pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo/ 'di 'dra ba 'di dag su dag cig /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa/ 'di dag ni/ rgyal
63a7(mdo sde): po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa yin no/ /de nas de thos ma thag tu bram ze
63b1(mdo sde): de bcom ldan 'das la shin tu dga' bar gyur te/ mir gyur pa la yang 'di lta bu'i gnas thob pa yod pa ste/ kye ma bdag kyang sangs rgyas su gyur te 'jig rten du 'byung
63b2(mdo sde): bar gyur cig ces byas so/ /de nas des bsam pa/ gnas 'di lta bu ni/ yid smon du byas pa tsam gyis 'grub par mi 'gyur gyi/ ma la bdag gis sbyin pa dag byin zhing
63b3(mdo sde): bsod nams dag byas la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam gdab po snyam nas nam nangs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
63b4(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal te mnyan du yod par chas so/ /khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin yang g.yog 'khor lnga brgya dang rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du dong ste/ khyim bdag mgon med
63b5(mdo sde): zas sbyin gyis thag ring po zhig nas bram ze de mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bram ze de la smras pa/ bram ze/ khyod kyis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du de'i bar ngo mtshar rmad du
63b6(mdo sde): byung ba'i chos lta cung zad cig mthong ngam/ de nas bram ze des khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la thams cad bsnyan do/ /de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin
63b7(mdo sde): gyis bram ze la smras pa/ bram ze/ khyod kyis ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba de lta bu dag mthong na khyod ci 'dod par gyur/ bram ze des smras pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
64a1(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub 'dod mod kyi/ khyim bdag /'on kyang gnas de lta bu ni/ yid smon tsam gyis 'grub par mi 'gyur bas na/ bdag gis
64a2(mdo sde): slong mo byas la sbyin pa dag byin zhing bsod nams dag bya bar 'dod do/ /de nas de thos ma thag tu khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bram ze de la nor gyi phung po chen
64a3(mdo sde): po byin no/ /bram ze des kyang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zla ba gsum du spyan drangs nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du yo byad thams cad
64a4(mdo sde): s byar nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la zla ba gsum gyi bar du yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bskur byas nas tha ma'i nyin par sangs rgyas
64a5(mdo sde): la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pas tshim par byas nas bcom ldan 'das la na bza' 'bum ri ba phul lo/ /dge slong gzhan
64a6(mdo sde): dag la yang re re la na bza' ras zung re phul nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab ste/ kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na bdag 'jig
64a7(mdo sde): rten long ba/ 'dren pa med pa/ ston pa med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar
64b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur cig ces byas
64b2(mdo sde): so| |de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze de la bka' stsal pa/ bram ze/ legs so legs so/ /bram ze/ khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'jig rten long ba/ 'dren pa
64b3(mdo sde): med pa| ston pa med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig
64b4(mdo sde): rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mya ngan med ces bya bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes
64b5(mdo sde): gsungs so/ / //nyam chung ba zhes bya ba ni/ glang gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la mthar gyis bu bdun byung nas de dag rigs
64b6(mdo sde): dang mthun par ming btags ste 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khus bskyed bsrings nas mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/ /
64b7(mdo sde): de nas phyi zhig na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bsam pa/ bdag gis byis pa 'di dag mdza' sde dag gi nang du gzud par bya'o/ /de yang dad pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi
65a1(mdo sde): nang du gzud par bya'i/ ma dad pa rnams kyi nang du gzud par mi bya'o/ /gal te ma dad pa rnams kyi nang du btsud par gyur na ni/ 'di dag
65a2(mdo sde): kyang de dag gis bsten pas sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mi lta bar 'gyur srid do snyam nas sangs rgyas pa'i mdza' sde'i nang du btsud do/ /de la ma dad pa'i mdza' sde gang yin
65a3(mdo sde): pa de dag ni/ gar thabs dang / grong rgyu ba dang / smad 'tshong ma rnams la chags shing 'khod do/ /khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi bu rnams ni/ dge bsnyen gyi
65a4(mdo sde): mdza' sde rnams dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la lhag par bya ba byed pa dang / bsnyen gnas dang / chos nyan pa la chags shing 'khod do/ /mnyan du
65a5(mdo sde): yod pa de na bram ze'i khye'u dbul zhing 'tsho bas phongs pa zhig 'dug pa des bsam pa/ bdag mdza' sde dag gi nang du zhugs la/ bdag gis de dag la brten
65a6(mdo sde): nas 'tsho ba btsal bar bya'o snyam nas dge bsnyen gyi mdza' sde'i nang du 'jug par 'dod de dris pa/ nor gyi bungs ci tsam gyis na khyad kyi nang du 'jug tu dbang / de
65a7(mdo sde): dag gis smras pa/ kaR+sha pa Na lnga brgyas nged kyi nang du 'jug tu dbang ngo / /bram ze'i khye'u des smras pa/ bdag la kaR+sha pa Na lnga brgya lta ga la yod/ de'i steng du khyed ni/
65b1(mdo sde): dbang phyug gis chog par 'dug la sbyin pa la sred pa yin na/ bdag ni/ dbul po 'tsho bas phongs pa zhig yin pas na bdag gis khyod la nor de snyed 'bul mi nus so/ /de nas
65b2(mdo sde): khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi bu rnams kyis smras pa/ gal te khyod bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad par byed na ni/ nged kyis khyod la kaR+sha pa Na lnga brgya sbyin no/ /bram
65b3(mdo sde): ze'i khye'us smras pa/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma de'i yon tan rnams bdag gis mi shes na/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i yon tan rnams ji lta bu yin/ de nas khyim bdag mgon
65b4(mdo sde): med zas sbyin gyi bu rnams kyis bram ze'i khye'u de la sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa brjod do/ /de nas de thos ma thag tu bram ze'i khye'u de sangs rgyas la shin tu dga' bar gyur to//
65b5(mdo sde): dga' bar gyur nas smras pa/ bdag kyang khyed kyi nang du 'jug par bgyi'o/ /bdag kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi bar
65b6(mdo sde): bgyi'o| |de nas mgon med zas sbyin gyi bu de rnams kyis bram ze'i khye'u des tshig de lta bu brjod pa thos so/ /thos nas kyang de rnams kyis de la kaR+sha pa Na brgya phrag du ma
65b7(mdo sde): byin na| |bram ze'i khye'u de yang de rnams kyi nang du zhugs so/ /de nas phyi zhig na mdza' sde bo de rnams kyi blo skyes pa/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zla ba gsum
66a1(mdo sde): gyi bar du spyan drangs la/ yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur bya'o/ /zhes zer ro/ /de'i nang na kha cig na re/ bdag cag kun gyis
66a2(mdo sde): zla ba gsum thog thag tu de 'ba' zhig byed kyang 'dug mi nus kyi/ nyin res kyis bshos gsol bar bya'o/ /zhes zer ro/ /bram ze'i khye'us smras pa/ bdag ni/ dbul
66a3(mdo sde): la 'tsho bas phongs te/ nyin res gzung ba de lta bu bdag gis mi nus so/ /zhes zer ro/ /der kha cig na re/ su sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la
66a4(mdo sde): bshos gsol mi nus pa de ni/ bdag cag gi nang nas gud du byung zhig ces zer ro/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'us bsam pa/ bdag gis 'di rnams kyi nang du de'u ma chud
66a5(mdo sde): de chud na/ bdag 'di rnams kyi nang nas 'byung ba ni/ cha ma yin no snyam nas smras pa/ bdag gis nyin res mjug tu gyis la khyed kyi lhag rol ci yod pa de dag thams
66a6(mdo sde): cad kyang bdag la byin cig / mdza' sde bo rnams kyis smras pa/ khyod ji ltar dga' ba de bzhin du bya'o/ /zhes byas nas de rnams kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge
66a7(mdo sde): s long gi dge 'dun zla ba gsum gyi bar du spyan drangs nas nyin res kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la yo byad thams cad kyis zla ba gsum gyi bar du
66b1(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur byas so/ /der de bdag gi lhag rol ci yod pa de dag thams cad bram ze'i khye'u la byin nas bram ze'i khye'us de dag thams cad bsdus te gzhan dag kyang
66b2(mdo sde): kaR+sha pa Na gzhan dag 'bul du bcug nas tha ma'i nyin par des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim du spyan drangs te/ rgyal po gsal rgyal dang / khyim
66b3(mdo sde): bdag mgon med zas sbyin la yang bskyal nas des de nyid kyi mtshan mo lam yang mdzes par byas/ grong khyer yang mdzes par byas nas de nyid kyi mtshan mo bza' ba
66b4(mdo sde): dang / bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang po sbyar te nang par sngar langs nas gdan bshams te chu ra bkang nas bcom ldan 'das la 'phrin gyis gdugs tshod bskul
66b5(mdo sde): pa| btsun pa gdugs tshod la bab ste bshos lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab par dgongs te gshegs su gsol zhes bskul to/ /de nas
66b6(mdo sde): b com ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas dge slong mang pos zham ring byas te dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas
66b7(mdo sde): bram ze'i khye'u de'i bkad sa ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'u des sangs
67a1(mdo sde): rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams bde bar bzhugs par rig nas rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang / bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po
67a2(mdo sde): mang pos tshom par byas te ci bzhed pa bstabs nas bcom ldan 'das la che ba la 'os pa'i na bza' phul lo/ /dge slong gzhan dag la yang re re la ras zung re phul
67a3(mdo sde): nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab pa/ kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na bdag 'jig rten long ba/ 'dren pa med pa/ ston pa med
67a4(mdo sde): par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes
67a5(mdo sde): bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur cig ces byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram
67a6(mdo sde): ze'i khye'u de la bka' stsal pa/ bram ze'i khye'u/ legs so legs so/ /ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bram ze'i khye'u khyod 'jig rten long ba/ 'dren pa med pa/ ston pa
67a7(mdo sde): med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig ba dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes
67b1(mdo sde): bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthun mdzad ces bya bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes gsungs so// //pad+ma gnyis
67b2(mdo sde): zhes bya ba de la/ pad+ma dang po ni/ gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/ rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi lugs kyis na/ nyin gcig bzhin du dus gsum du bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir
67b3(mdo sde): 'gro zhing / bcom ldan 'das la bdug pa dang / phye ma dang / spos dang / me tog rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de'i tshe kun dga'
67b4(mdo sde): ra ba'i srung ma'i gnas dga' ldan gyi pad+ma'i mtsho'i nang nas dus ma yin par pad+ma zhig skyes nas de'i blo skyes pa/ rgyal po gsal rgyal nyin gcig bzhin du dus gsum du
67b5(mdo sde): dge sbyong go'u ta ma la bdug pa dang / phye ma dang / spos dang / me tog rnams kyis bkur sti byed kyi/ pad+ma 'di bdag gis de la 'bul bar bya'o snyam nas de khyer te mnyan du
67b6(mdo sde): yod par song ngo / /de'i tshe sred med kyi bu la dad pa zhig ya mtshan can thams cad la mchod sbyin byed pa la zhugs so/ /de nas des mi des dus ma yin pa'i pad+ma de lta bu khyer
67b7(mdo sde): te 'ong ma mthong nas des de la smras pa/ kye ma/ khyod kyis pad+ma 'o ni bdag la byin cig dang / 'dis bdag gis legs ldan srid med kyi bu la mchod par bya'o/ /khyod la yang
68a1(mdo sde): bdag gis kaR+sha pa Na lnga brgya sbyin no/ /zhes byas so/ /de'i tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin g.yog 'khor lnga brgya dang bcom ldan
68a2(mdo sde): 'das la blta ba'i phyir chas pa las khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis mi de tshig de skad zer ba thos so/ /thos nas kyang des bsam pa/ 'di ni/ nyes par bshad
68a3(mdo sde): pa'i chos can yin na/ nor gyi bungs 'di snyed cig nyos te sred med kyi bu la 'bul bar 'dod na/ ci'i phyir ngas nor ches mang du bskyed de nyos la bcom ldan 'das
68a4(mdo sde): la dbul bar mi bya snyam nas des kun dga' ra ba'i srung ma la smras pa/ ngas khyod la kaR+sha ba Na stong sbyin gyi/ pad+ma'o ni nga la byin cig /de nas sred med kyi bu la dad
68a5(mdo sde): pa des thos nas nga rgyal skyes te/ des kaR+sha pa Na nyis stong sbyin par byas so/ /de bzhin du de gnyis kyis kaR+sha pa Na 'bum gyi bar du gong nas gong du bskyed do/ /de nas
68a6(mdo sde): kun dga' ra ba'i srung ma de'i blo skyes pa/ 'di ltar khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin lta bus mi zhig gi phyir 'bum stong bar byed pa dang sbyar na/ dge slong go'u
68a7(mdo sde): ta ma de ni/ che ba zhig yin gor ma chag na/ ci'i phyir bdag nyid song la bcom ldan 'das de la mchod par mi bya snyam du bsam nas kun dga' ra ba'i srung ma des
68b1(mdo sde): khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la smras pa/ khyim bdag /bdag la nor mi dgos kyi/ bdag nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das de la mchod par bya'o/ /zhes byas nas pad+ma de
68b2(mdo sde): k hyer te rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song nas kun dga' ra ba'i srung ma des thag ring po zhig nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa
68b3(mdo sde): gnyis kyis legs par brgyan cings pa bar byas pa/ me lus kyi dbyibs su 'dug pa lta bu/ me lce mar gyis btab pa lta bu/ mar me gser gyi snod du bzhag pa lta bu/
68b4(mdo sde): mchod sdong rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa lta bu/ blo gsal zhing dri ma med pa rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang
68b5(mdo sde): mchog tu dga' ba skyes so/ /dga' ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal tshe bcom ldan 'das
68b6(mdo sde): la mchod pa'i phyir steng du bor na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus pad+ma de shing rta'i phang lo tsam du gyur te bcom ldan 'das gshegs na ni 'gro'o/ /gzhes na ni/ sdod do/ /de
68b7(mdo sde): n as kun dga' ra ba'i srung ma des cho 'phrul de lta bu mthong nas lhag par yang bcom ldan 'das la shin tu dga' bar gyur te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
69a1(mdo sde): tu smon lam btab pa/ kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na bdag 'jig rten long ba/ 'dran pa med pa/ ston pa med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
69a2(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na
69a3(mdo sde): med pa| lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur cig ces byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' ra ba'i srung med la bka'
69a4(mdo sde): stsal pa| bzhin bzang / legs so legs so/ /ma 'ongs pa'i dus na khyod 'jig rten long ba/ 'dren pa med pa/ ston pa med par de bzhin gshegs pa
69a5(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo
69a6(mdo sde): sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i bla ma zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes gsungs so// //pad+ma gnyis pa ni/ gleng
69a7(mdo sde): gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa de nyid na kun dga' ra ba'i srung ma zhig 'dug pa'i mtsho'i nang nas dus ma yin par pad+ma zhig skyes te de'i
69b1(mdo sde): blo skyes pa/ pad+ma 'di bdag gis rgyal po gsal rgyal la dbul bar bya'o/ /'on tang bdag gi longs spyod chen po dag gi 'byung khungs su 'gyur ro snyam nas de khyer te
69b2(mdo sde): rgyal po'i pho brang du chas te song ngo / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrod pa gcig bu'i lam ston pa/ rnam pa gnyis kyi shes bya dang ye shes la mnga' brnyes pa/ ma
69b3(mdo sde): 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum la mkhas pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/ 'gro ba lngar 'gro ba las rnam par grol ba/ skye mched drug la
69b4(mdo sde): mkhas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod yul ba/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms
69b5(mdo sde): par 'jug pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/ yang dag par seng+ge'i sgra chen po sgrog pa rnams ni/ chos nyid kyis nyin dus gsum/ mtshan dus gsum ste nyin mtshan
69b6(mdo sde): dus drug tu sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/ su ni/ rgud/ su ni/ dar/ su ni/ phongs shing 'dug /su ni/ nyam nga bar 'dug /su ni/ gnod pa
69b7(mdo sde): dang ldan/ su ni/ phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan /su ni/ ngan song du gzhol /su ni/ ngan song du 'bab /su ni/ ngan song du bab /su ni/ ngas ngan song nas phyung ste mtho ris
70a1(mdo sde): dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/ su ni/ nyes par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/ su ni/ 'phags
70a2(mdo sde): pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/ su ni/ dge ba'i rtse ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/ su ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin
70a3(mdo sde): pa las yongs su smin par bya/ su ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin zin pa las ye shes kyi mtshon gyis brtol bar bya/ su la ni/ sangs rgyas byung bas
70a4(mdo sde): brgyan pa'i 'jig rten 'bras bu yod par bya snyam du ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go / rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/ /dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/ /gdul
70a5(mdo sde): bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/ /sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ kun dga' ra ba'i srung ma de bla na med pa yang dag par
70a6(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par sems bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /snyam du dgongs nas snga dro sham thabs dang / chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas
70a7(mdo sde): mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la gshegs so/ /de nas kun dga' ra ba'i srung ma des thag ring po zhig nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo / /mthong nas
70b1(mdo sde): kyang bcom ldan 'das la shin tu dga' bar gyur to/ /dga' bar gyur nas bsam pa/ bdag gis rgyal po gsal rgyal btang la bcom ldan 'das la bdag nyid kyis
70b2(mdo sde): mchod par bya'o snyam nas des pad+ma de bcom ldan 'das kyi steng gi nam mkha' la bor ba las/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus pad+ma de shing rta'i phang lo tsam du gyur te bcom
70b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das gshegs na ni/ 'gro'o/ /gzhes na ni/ sdod do/ /de nas kun dga' ra ba'i srung ma des cho 'phrul de lta bu mthong nas lhag par bcom ldan la shin tu
70b4(mdo sde): dga' bar gyur te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab ste/ kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na/ bdag 'jig rten long ba/ 'dren pa med pa/
70b5(mdo sde): ston pa med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen
70b6(mdo sde): pa| skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur cig ces byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
70b7(mdo sde): kyis kun dga' ra ba'i srung ma de la bka' stsal pa/ bzhin bzang / legs so legs so/ /ma 'ongs pa'i dus na khyod 'jig rten long ba/ 'dren pa med pa/ ston pa med
71a1(mdo sde): par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig
71a2(mdo sde): rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bla ma zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes gsungs
71a3(mdo sde): so/ / //lta ba zhes bya ba ni/ /gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba/ yongs su 'dzin
71a4(mdo sde): pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang mnyam pa/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas te/ khyim bdag de yang byams pa'i rang bzhin can/ snying
71a5(mdo sde): rje dang ldan pa| sems can thams cad la mnyes gshin pa/ sbyin pa la sred pa| ya mtshan can thams cad dang lta ba mtshungs pa/ sbyin pa la blo snyoms pa zhig ste/ de dus
71a6(mdo sde): dus su mchod sbyin chen po byed la bstan bcos spyod pa thams cad kyi gzhung dpyod par byed de/ /des bltas na thams cad kyang bdag la ni/ bstod/ gzhan la ni/
71a7(mdo sde): smod par byed pas de dag gis khyim bdag de'i sems ma mgu'o/ /de nas phyi zhig na khyim bdag des bcom ldan 'das kyi bsngags pa thos nas de 'di snyam du sems
71b1(mdo sde): te| des chos thams cad rtogs pa las na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa yin par nges so snyam nas bsngags pa de thos ma thag tu sems bskyed pa/ kye ma
71b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bdag gi mchod sbyin gyi gnas 'dir gshegs kyang ci ma rung snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ bdag gis khyim bdag de'i
71b3(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed par bya dgos la/ 'di la brten nas gdul bar bya ba phal po che drang du yod do snyam nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal nas mi snang bar gyur te
71b4(mdo sde): khyim bdag de'i mchod sbyin gyi gnas su zhugs par gyur to/ /de nas khyim bdag des thag ring po zhig nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang
71b5(mdo sde): dga' ba skyes so/ /dga' ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyi nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das
71b6(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /kye ma bcom ldan 'das bdag gi mchod sbyin gyi gnas su gshegs te longs spyod par mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
71b7(mdo sde): khyim bdag de la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas khyim bdag des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas rang gi lag nas
72a1(mdo sde): bza' ba dang / bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang pos tshim par byas te ci bzhed pa bstabs nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go /de
72a2(mdo sde): n as bcom ldan 'das kyis de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spro ba bskyed nas khyim bdag de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'dod
72a3(mdo sde): b a skyes nas des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba gsum spyan drangs te rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du yo byad thams cad sbyar nas
72a4(mdo sde): s angs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bskur byas te tha ma'i nyin par sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun
72a5(mdo sde): rnams la zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa gsol nas bcom ldan 'das la na bza' 'bum ri ba phul lo/ /dge slong gzhan dag la yang re re la ras zung re phul
72a6(mdo sde): nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su smon lam btab ste/ kye ma dge ba'i rtsa 'dis na bdag 'jig rten long ba/ 'dren pa med pa/ ston pa med
72a7(mdo sde): par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes
72b1(mdo sde): bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur cig ces byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim
72b2(mdo sde): bdag de la bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag /legs so legs so/ /ma 'ongs pa'i dus na khyod 'jig rten long ba/ 'dren pa med pa/ ston pa med par de bzhin gshegs
72b3(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba
72b4(mdo sde): bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das legs mthong zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes gsungs so// //las brgya thams pa/ bam
72b5(mdo sde): po sum cu gcig pa/ rin po che zhes bya ba ni/ gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa nas ded dpon zhig gis zong khyer te rgya mtsho chen po'i nang
72b6(mdo sde): du chas so/ /ded dpon de yang mo ltas gtso bor 'dzin pa zhig ste/ des zong rnams rnga mo dang / bong bu la sogs pa la bkal nas mnyan du yod pa'i phyi sgo chen po'i nang
72b7(mdo sde): nas byung ste lam po cher zhugs nas des sems 'di lta bu bskyed de/ gal te bdag rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas nye zho med par bde bar 'ongs te rgya mtsho'i gru bo che'i don grub
73a1(mdo sde): nas phyir 'khor bar gyur na/ sgo 'dir bdag gis sgo'i dus ston bya'o/ /lam po che 'dir yang lam gyi dus ston bya'o/ /zhes byas nas rgya
73a2(mdo sde): mtsho chen por song ngo / /de nas de rin po che'i gling bgrod pa bsgrubs te rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas 'gram du byung nas des bsam pa/ bdag gru bo ches rgya mtsho chen po'i
73a3(mdo sde): nang du zhugs te/ des na bdag gis nor chen po bsgrubs kyi/ bdag gis rgya mtsho'i 'gram 'di nyid du rgya mtsho'i lha rnams dang / gru bo che la gnas pa'i lha rnams la
73a4(mdo sde): bkur bsti bya'o snyam nas des rgya mtsho'i 'gram de nyid du lha rnams la bkur sti chen po byas te mnyan du yod par chas so/ /de nas de mthar gyis rgyu zhing song song ba
73a5(mdo sde): las mnyan du yod par phyin nas mnyan du yod par zod rnams bzhag ste/ des grong khyer gyi phyi sgo chen po de dang / lam po che'i lha rnams la mchod pa chen po byas
73a6(mdo sde): nas sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed pa la zhugs te/ des rin po che'i phung po chen po spungs nas dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu
73a7(mdo sde): dang / sdug cing phongs pa dang / bkres pa rnams la sbyin pa byed pa la zhugs so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam ston pa/ rnam pa
73b1(mdo sde): gnyis kyi shes bya dang ye shes la mnga' brnyes pa/ ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum la mkhas pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/ 'gro ba lngar
73b2(mdo sde): 'gro ba las rnam par grol ba/ skye mched drug la mkhas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod yul ba/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa/ mthar
73b3(mdo sde): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/ yang dag pa'i seng+ge'i sgra chen po sgrog pa rnams ni/ chos
73b4(mdo sde): nyid kyis nyin dus gsum/ mtshan dus gsum ste nyin mtshan dus drug tu sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/ su ni/ rgud/ su ni/ dar/ su ni/ phongs
73b5(mdo sde): shing 'dug / su ni/ nyam nga bar gyur/ su ni/ gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni/ phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni/ ngan song du gzhol/ su ni/
73b6(mdo sde): ngan song du 'bab/ su ni/ ngan song du bab/ su ni/ ngas ngan song nas phyung ste mtho ris dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/ su ni/ nyes par spyod pa'i 'dam
73b7(mdo sde): du bying pa las lag nas drang bar bya/ su ni/ 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug par bya/ su ni/ dge
74a1(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/ su ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/ su ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams
74a2(mdo sde): yongs su smin pa las ye shes kyi mtshon gyis brtol bar bya/ su la ni/ sangs rgyas byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten 'bras bu yod par bya snyam du ye shes gzigs
74a3(mdo sde): pa 'jug go/ /rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/ /dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/ /gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/ /sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/ /
74a4(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ ded dpon 'dis ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par sems bskyed par 'gyur
74a5(mdo sde): r o snyam du dgongs nas snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas dge slong mang pos zham ring byas te dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun
74a6(mdo sde): du bdar nas sgo de nyid nas mnyan du yod pa'i nang du gshegs pa dang / ded dpon des thag ring po zhig nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan
74a7(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan cings pa bar byas pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang de bcom ldan 'das la shin tu dga' ba skyes so/ /dga' ba skyes nas des
74b1(mdo sde): r in po che spar gyis btab ste bcom ldan 'das la gtor nas de dag sangs rgyas kyi mthus bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du lding khang lta bur chags te 'dug nas bcom ldan
74b2(mdo sde): 'das gshegs na ni/ 'gro /gzhes na ni/ sdod do/ /de nas ded dpon des cho 'phrul de lta bu mthong nas lhag par yang dga' ba skyes so/ /dga' ba skyes nas bcom
74b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te gsol pa/ zla ba gsum gyi bar du bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i na bza' dang / zhal zas dang /
74b4(mdo sde): gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zong rnams sbyar bar 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan
74b5(mdo sde): 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas ded dpon de la gnang ngo / /de nas ded dpon des bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du yo
74b6(mdo sde): b yad thams cad sbyar te sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la zla ba gsum gyi bar du yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bskur byas nas tha ma'i nyin par sangs
74b7(mdo sde): rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa gsol nas bcom ldan 'das la na bza' 'bum ri ba phul lo/ /dge slong gzhan dag la yang
75a1(mdo sde): re re la ras zung re phul nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab ste/ kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na bdag
75a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten long ba/ 'dren pa med pa/ ston pa med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde
75a3(mdo sde): bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur cig
75a4(mdo sde): ces byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ded dpon/ legs so legs so/ /ma 'ongs pa'i dus na khyod 'jig rten long ba/ 'dren pa med
75a5(mdo sde): pa| ston pa med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten
75a6(mdo sde): mkhyen pa| skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin chen gtsug tor can zhes bya bar 'gyur
75a7(mdo sde): ro| |zhes gsungs so/ / //nor zhes bya ba ni/ gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag cig gnas ba des thabs zlar bab pa
75b1(mdo sde): las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba dgu'am/ bcu lon pa dang / bu gzugs
75b2(mdo sde): bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas te/ de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas rigs dang mthun par ming btags te/ de 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun
75b3(mdo sde): mar dang / mar gyi snying khus bskyed bsrings nas de gang gi tshe cher skyes ba de'i tshe yi ge dang / khong rtsis dang / shod dgod pa dang / lag rtsis dang / nga byung ba dang / sba ba
75b4(mdo sde): dang / dgram pa dang / gos brtag pa dang / nor bu brtag pa dang / rin po che brtag pa dang / spos brtag pa dang / sman brtag pa dang / glang po brtag pa dang / rta brtag pa
75b5(mdo sde): dang / go mtshon brtag pa bslabs te/ yi ge mkhas pa dang / klog mkhas pa dang / mdzangs pa dang / bya ba la gsal ba dang / yid gzhungs pa dang / brtag pa rnams
75b6(mdo sde): ba brgyad la byang bar gyur to/ /de nas phyi zhig na des zod khyer te/ rgya mtsho'i nang du song ba las/ rgya mtsho'i gru bo che'i don grub nas phyir 'ongs so/ /khyim bdag des kyang
75b7(mdo sde): khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la brten nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed de skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs so/ /de nas phyi zhig na khyim
76a1(mdo sde): bdag des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim du spyan drangs te rang gi lag nas bza' ba dang / bca' ba gtsang ma bzang
76a2(mdo sde): po mang pos tshim par byas nas ci bzhed pa bstabs te chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcos ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag de'i bsam pa dang / bag
76a3(mdo sde): la nyal dang / khams dang / shes pa dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te/ de nas khyim bdag de 'khor dang bcas pas stan
76a4(mdo sde): de nyid la 'khod bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des
76a5(mdo sde): bden pa mthong nas yang dang yang du rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'gro zhing bcom ldan 'das la chos nyan par byed do/ /bdag gi bu yang dang yang du dran par byed do/
76a6(mdo sde): kye ma de yang 'dir 'ongs te bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa rnyed par gyur la/ chos 'di lta bu dag kyang thob na ci ma rung snyam mo/ /de nas phyi zhig na khyim
76a7(mdo sde): b dag gi bu de rgya mtsho'i gru bo che'i don grub ste phyir 'ongs te des skyed mos tshal du rdzas rnams bzhag nas pha ma gnyis blta ba'i phyir shin tu rings par bdag gi
76b1(mdo sde): khyim du song ba las/ de'i pha ma gnyis chos mnyan pa'i phyir rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song nas khyim bdag gi bu des pha ma gnyis chos mnyan pa'i phyir rgyal bu rgyal byed
76b2(mdo sde): kyi tshal du song / zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang de yang rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal de nyid du song ste/ de der phyin nas bdag gis pha ma gnyis blta bar bya'o snyam pa las khyim
76b3(mdo sde): bdag gi bu des pha ma gnyis chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bcom ldan ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom
76b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te pha ma gnyis kyi mgul nas 'jus nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom
76b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis khye'u de'i mdun du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spro ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i gtam bka' stsal to/ /de nas de thos ma thag tu khye'u de
76b6(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'dod pa skyes so/ /de nas khyim bdag de bcom ldan 'das las chos thos nas bu dang lhan cig tu bdag gi khyim du
76b7(mdo sde): song ngo / /der song nas de gnyis kyis bu de la smras pa/ bu/ khyod kyis rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas bdag cag gnyis la ci zhig khyer te 'ongs/ khye'us smras pa/ rin po che
77a1(mdo sde): rin thang che bdag 'tshal te mchis so/ /pha ma gnyis kyis de la smras pa/ bu/ khyod kyis ni/ rgya mtsho'i nang du song nas sdug bsngal stong
77a2(mdo sde): phrag grangs med pa myong ste rin po che tha mal pa dag khyer te 'ongs so/ /bdag cag gis ni/ 'di nyid na 'dug bzhin bzhin du tshegs chung dus rin po che rin thang chen po
77a3(mdo sde): dag rnyed do/ /khye'us smras pa/ 'o na tshegs chung dus rnyed pa'i rin po che de dag ci 'dra ba blta bar 'tshal lo/ /de nas pha ma gnyis kyis de la bdag cag gnyis kyi
77a4(mdo sde): yon tan rgyas par brjod do/ /de nas de thos ma thag tu khye'u de lhag par yang bcom ldan 'das la dga' bar gyur to/ /dga' bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba
77a5(mdo sde): der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i rkyen du
77a6(mdo sde): 'tsham pa'i chos bstan to/ /de nas khyim bdag gi bu des bcom ldan 'das kyi gtam mjug rdzogs par rig nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar
77a7(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /zla ba gsum gyi bar du bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi
77b1(mdo sde): dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / gdan dang / snyun gsos dang / sman zod rnams sbyar bar 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
77b2(mdo sde): bdag la gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag gi bu de la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas khyim bdag gi bu des bcom ldan 'das
77b3(mdo sde): kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du yo byad thams cad sbyar te/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la zla ba gsum gyi
77b4(mdo sde): b ar du yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas nas tha ma'i nyin par sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa gsol nas
77b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la na bza' 'bum ri ba phul lo/ /dge slong gzhan dag la yang re re la yang ras zung re phul nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
77b6(mdo sde): tu smon lam btab ste/ kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na bdag 'jig rten long ba/ 'dren pa med pa/ ston pa med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
77b7(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams
78a1(mdo sde): kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur cig ces byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u de la bka' stsal pa/ khyim
78a2(mdo sde): bdag gi bu/ legs so legs so/ /ma 'ongs pa'i dus na khyod 'jig rten long ba/ 'dren pa med pa/ ston pa med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
78a3(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha
78a4(mdo sde): dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chu rlabs zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes gsungs so// //stobs 'phrog ces bya ba ni/ gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa
78a5(mdo sde): na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe byang phyogs kyi pan tsa la'i rgyal po dang / lho phyogs gyi pan tsa la'i rgyal po gnyis phan tshun du mi mthun par gyur te dus dus su skye bo phal
78a6(mdo sde): po che kha 'dog par byed do/ /de gnyis kyi mdza' bo bshes shing gcugs pa ni/ rgyal po gsal rgyal yin te/ rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bsam pa/ bdag gis
78a7(mdo sde): thabs ji lta bu zhig gis de gnyis bsdum par bya snyam nas de'i blo skyes pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ ma dul ba 'dul ba yin na/ ma la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das
78b1(mdo sde): l a gsol ba gdab bo snyam nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan
78b2(mdo sde): 'das la rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ byang phyogs kyi pan tsa la'i rgyal po dang / lho phyogs kyi pan tsa la'i rgyal po gnyis phan tshun
78b3(mdo sde): mi mthun par gyur te de gnyis kyis dus dus su skye bo phal po che kha 'dog par bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das ni/ ma dul ba dul ba lags na/ thugs brtse ba'i slad
78b4(mdo sde): du de gnyis kyi 'khon sbyang ba'i slad du nan tan mdzad par gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gsal rgyal la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas rgyal
78b5(mdo sde): p o gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de rjes su yi rang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan
78b6(mdo sde): 'das kyi thad nas song ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal nas mi snang bar gyur te byang phyogs kyi yul pan tsa la dang / lho phyogs kyi yul pan tsa la
78b7(mdo sde): gnyis kyi bar mtshams su gshegs te bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nas de dag 'thab par sems pa de lta bur byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas byang phyogs kyi pan
79a1(mdo sde): tsa la'i rgyal po dang / lho phyogs kyi pan tsa la'i rgyal po gnyis kyis dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon nas g.yul 'gyed
79a2(mdo sde): pa'i phyir so so nas drangs so/ /de dag g.yul 'gyed par brtsams pa las sangs rgyas kyi mthus de gnyi gas rang rang pham ste ma nus nas gzhan gyis thub par mthong
79a3(mdo sde): s te| de gnyis so so nas shing rta re re la zhon te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs
79a4(mdo sde): gcig tu 'dug go/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang ci nas de gnyis gcig gis gcig mi mthong bar byin gyis brlabs te bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ 'di

79a6(mdo sde): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par sems bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /snyam du dgongs nas gcig la ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i

79b1(mdo sde): p o stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol

79b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba'i tshig gis rab tu phyung ste bsnyen par rdzogs
79b4(mdo sde): par mdzad nas de la lung yang phog ste/ des kyang brtson pa dang / sgrub pa dang / 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas

80a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis byang phyogs kyi pan tsa la'i rgyal po la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas byang phyogs kyi pan tsa la'i rgyal pos bcom
80a2(mdo sde): l dan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rang gi yul du spyan drangs te sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi
80a3(mdo sde): d ge 'dun la zla ba gsum gyi bar du yo byad thams cad sbyar nas yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bskur byas te tha ma'i nyin par sangs rgyas las sogs pa dge

80a5(mdo sde): phul nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab ste/ kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na/ bdag 'jig rten long ba/ 'dren pa med pa /

80b5(mdo sde): gong ma sreg / pha dang mi rgod sha za dang / /dbang po'i mgo ni tha ma yin/ /bu zhes bya ba ni/ gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na bram ze
80b6(mdo sde): zhig gnas pa des thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas de
80b7(mdo sde): zla ba dgu'am/ bcu lon pa dang / khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas te/ de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas rigs dang mthun par ming
81a1(mdo sde): btags te/ 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khus bskyed bsrings so/ /'dod pa rnams ni/ tshwa chu dang 'dra
81a2(mdo sde): ste| ci tsam du bsten pa de tsam du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas phyis kyang mthar gyis bram ze de'i bu gcig dang gnyis nas bdun gyi bar du byung nas de rnams rigs dang
81a3(mdo sde): mthun pa'i ming btags te/ 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khus bskyed bsrings nas de dag gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe yi ge dang / bram

81a6(mdo sde): pa dang / blang ba dang / kha ton dang / kha ton slob tu gzhug pa'i thabs bslabs nas las rnam pa drug la mkhas pa'i bram zer gyur to/ /de nas phyi zhig na bram ze des
81a7(mdo sde): bu de dag thams cad khyim phub ste bram ze de'i khyim na nor ci yod pa de dag thams cad so sor bgos nas bu de dag la byin no/ /de nas phyi zhig na bram ze de'i chung ma yang shi
81b1(mdo sde): bram ze de yang rgas te mig gis mi mthong bar gyur nas de bu de rnams kyis khyim nas bskrad de/ de gzhan dag gi khyim du slong zhing 'tsho bar byed do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan

82a1(mdo sde): ni nyes par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/ su ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la
82a2(mdo sde): dbang byed du gzhug par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/ su ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/ su ni dge ba'i

82a6(mdo sde): nas mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la gshegs te/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod par gshegs pa na bram ze rgas shing 'khogs la gtugs pa/ 'khar ba dang snod
82a7(mdo sde): thogs shing gzhan dag gi khyim du slong ba de gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang bram ze de la bka' stsal pa/ bram ze rgas shing 'khogs la gtugs pa/ khyod ci'i phyir 'khar ba

82b2(mdo sde): b srings nas thos pas kyang mthar phyin par bgyis te bzhag nas mchis brang dang bcas te btsems te bdag gi khyim na ci bdog pa de dag thams cad kyang bdag gis so sor bgos

82b7(mdo sde): dag gis/ /bdag spangs de dag bden mo min/ /srin po'i bu yi cha lugs can/ /pha pha zhes brjod de mi brjid/ /rta rgan zho sha zas pa bzhin/ /na tshod yal bar gyur pa
83a1(mdo sde): na| |gzhon nu rnams kyi pha rgan zhig / gzhan gyi khyim du slong bar gyur/ /rten la ma phan bu rnams pas/ /bdag gi 'khar ba 'di bdam ste//
83a2(mdo sde): 'khar ba yi yi yon tan mthus/ /ba lang rdung zhing 'ong ba dang / /sprul dang khyi za zlog par byed/ /mun pa'i nang na mdun du 'gro/ /ya nga'i gnas su tshod kyang rig /rdeg 'chos
83a3(mdo sde): na yang bdag la rton/ /de nas bram ze des bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa 'di dag thos nas bu rnams kyi 'khor du song ste brjod nas
83a4(mdo sde): bu rnams kyis de thos ma thag tu pha la bzod pa gsol te snga mkho bzhin du khyim gyi bdag por bzhag go/ /de nas phyi zhig na bram ze des bsam pa/ bdag gi dpal
83a5(mdo sde): dang skal pa dang ldan pa gang ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad ni/ bcom ldan 'das go'u ta ma de'i bka' drin yin na/ ma la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das
83a6(mdo sde): go'u ta ma de la bshos gsol la rin thang che ba'i na bza' 'bul bar bya gor ma chag snyam nas bram ze des bcom ldan 'das spyan drangs te bza' ba dang / bca' ba
83a7(mdo sde): gtsang ma bzang po mang po dag gsol nas rin thang che ba'i na bza' phul lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze de dang / bu de rnams la de dang mthun pa'i chos
83b1(mdo sde): bstan te/ des na bram ze de 'khor dang bcas pas stan de dag nyid la 'khod bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du
