157a1(mdo sde): po rnams rnam par dwangs shing bzhin gyi mdog yongs su dag ste pags pa'i mdog dkar bar gyur to/ /zhes thos lags na/ de'i 'gro ba ni/ gang
157a2(mdo sde): lags/ de'i skye gnas ni/ gang lags/ 'gro ba'i sa ni/ gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /rigs kyi bu de ni/ nga'i chos kyi rjes su
157a3(mdo sde): mthun pa'i chos rtogs pas na/ nor du gyur pa yin no/ /dge slong dag /rigs kyi bu de mya ngan las 'das kyi/ 'di'i rus bu la rus bu'i mchod pa gyis shig /de ltar
157a4(mdo sde): b com ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rmos pa mchog tu gyur par lung bstan nas dge slong mang po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa bzhin du mnyan
157a5(mdo sde): nyan te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas dong ste de dag gis de'i rus bu la rus bu'i mchod pa byas te rus bu'i mchod rten brtsigs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la
157a6(mdo sde): ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rmos
157a7(mdo sde): pas las ci bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas ba drus mas brdungs te bkum lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /'di nyid
157b1(mdo sde): kyis las de lta bu byas shing bsags pa'i steng du lhag par yang de'i smon lam las gyur te/ puska ra'i sngon gyi rgyud las 'byung ba bzhin du rgyas par brjod par bya'o//
157b2(mdo sde): gsol pa/ btsun pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rmos pas las ci bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes lags/ las
157b3(mdo sde): ci bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas rmas zhu lub tu yog par gyur te/ 'di'i lus las rnag khrag 'dzag cing / 'di'i lus las dri nga ba byung bar gyur la/ 'dis
157b4(mdo sde): b com ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te mi mnyes par ma bgyis nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom
157b5(mdo sde): pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis te rab tu 'byung ba'i sems bskyed ma thag tu de'i lus rma ma mchis par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /da
157b6(mdo sde): ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/ 'das pa'i dus na yang 'dis las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ 'di nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams
157b7(mdo sde): su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag /las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang /
158a1(mdo sde): rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang / mi dge ba rnams byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ zin pa'i phung po
158a2(mdo sde): dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing
158a3(mdo sde): dus la bab pa na/ /'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer wA ra NA si na rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba zhig
158a4(mdo sde): rgyal po byed de/ de'i tshe wA ra NA si na khyim bdag gnyis shig gnas pa las/ de gnyis phan tshun 'gras nas de'i nang nas gcig gis rgyal po la nor mang po zhig
158a5(mdo sde): p hul te khyim bdag gcig shos rgyal po la brnyas nas de rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis shags 'gyed pa'i tshe g.yo shags kyis pham par byas nas khyim bdag de
158a6(mdo sde): la byin te/ des de rang gi khyim du khrid nas lcag gis zhen par bzhus nas lcag rma de dag gi nang du dug gi phye mas gtor te/ de'i lus de sha snag bu bzhin du gyur
158a7(mdo sde): nas de phu nu rnams kyis nor mang po zhig gis blus te sman pa'i lung gis de'i lus sos par byas so/ /de nas phyi zhig na de skyo ba skyes nas bdag khyim na gnas
158b1(mdo sde): pas chog gi / dka' thub kyi nags tshal du 'gro'o snyam ste sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byas nas dka' thub kyi nags tshal du rten bcas so/ /de der song nas slob
158b2(mdo sde): dpon med pa dang / man ngag med par byang chub kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dran par byas nas rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon sum du byas so/ /de nas des bsam pa/ khyim
158b3(mdo sde): bdag des bdag gi rgyud las bsod nams ma yin pa chen po bskyed kyi/ /bdag song la khyim bdag de'i ra mda' bya'o snyam nas gnas de nyid nas nam mkha' las khyim
158b4(mdo sde): bdag de ga la ba der song nas 'bar ba dang / lam mer 'dug pa dang / char 'bab pa dang / glog 'gyu ba'i cho 'phrul rnams bstan to/ /so so'i skye bo ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyis
158b5(mdo sde): myur du dad par 'gyur te/ de sdong po sog las bcad pa bzhin du de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/ skal pa chen po mar sbyon/ bdag nyes par spyod pa'i 'dam du
158b6(mdo sde): bying pa las lag nas drang du gsol zhes byas so/ /de nas de kho na la snying brtse ba'i phyir sa la babs nas des de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te bzod pa gsol nas smras pa /
158b7(mdo sde): 'phags pa khyod kyang bsod snyoms bzhed la/ bdag kyang bsod nams 'tshal bas/ bdag gi skyed mos tshal 'di nyid du bzhugs shig dang / bdag gis yo byad thams cad
159a1(mdo sde): kyis bsnyen bkur bgyi'o/ /de nas rang sangs rgyas des khyim bdag de la cang mi smra bas gnang ngo / /de nas khyim bdag des rang sangs rgyas de'i
159a2(mdo sde): phyir yal ga dang / lo ma'i spyil po phubs nas yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byed pa la zhugs so/ /de nas phyi zhig na rang sangs rgyas des bsam pa/ bdag gis
159a3(mdo sde): rnag can gyi lus 'dis bya ba gang yin pa de ni/ bdag gis byas zin gyi/ ma la bdag zhi ba'i dbyings su 'jug par bya'o snyam nas 'bar ba dang / lam mer 'dug
159a4(mdo sde): pa dang / char 'bab pa dang / glog 'gyu ba'i cho 'phrul rnams bstan nas phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das
159a5(mdo sde): so| |de nas khyim bdag des de'i sku gdung la mchod pa byas nas sku gdung gi mchod rten brtsigs te mchod rten de la bkur sti chen po byas nas smon lam btab pa / kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na/
159a6(mdo sde): bdag gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye bar shog cig /'di bas kyang ches khyad
159a7(mdo sde): par du 'phags pa'i ston pa mnyes par byed par gyur cig / mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig /yon tan 'di lta bu dag kyang bdag gis thob par shog cig /bdag gis
159b1(mdo sde): 'di la gnod par byas pa'i las de bdag la 'ong bar ma gyur cig / ci ste las 'di'i rnam par smin pa bdag la gdon mi za bar 'ongs par gyur na yang rab tu 'byung ba'i sems
159b2(mdo sde): bskyed ma thag tu bdag gi bkra mi shis pa de med par gyur te bkra shis pa 'byung bar gyur cig ces byas so/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe khyim bdag tu gyur pa
159b3(mdo sde): gang yin pa de ni/ rmos pa 'di kho na yin te/ des khyim bdag de'i lus la lcag gis bzhus nas dug gi phye mas gtor ba'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni/ gang dang gang
159b4(mdo sde): du skyes pa de dang der lus 'di lta bur gyur to/ /des phyir yang rang sangs rgyas de la bkur sti byas nas smon lam btab pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni/ gang dang gang
159b5(mdo sde): du skyes pa de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes te/ dge slong dag /rang sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'bum phrag bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa
159b6(mdo sde): nga lta bu mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma bgyis/ rab tu 'byung ba'i sems bskyed ma thag tu de'i bkra mi shis pa med par gyur nas bkra shis ba byung bar gyur te nga nyid kyi
159b7(mdo sde): bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /gzhan yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung
160a1(mdo sde): gi gsung rab la 'di rab tu byung ste/ der 'dis tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas dbang po rnams yongs su smin par byas pa des na/ da ltar
160a2(mdo sde): rnam par grol bar gyur to/ /bram ze gsum zhes bya ba de la/ bram ze dang po ni/ gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na bram ze zhig
160a3(mdo sde): gis mchod sbyin bya bar brtsams te mchod sbyin byed pa der rgyal khams tha dad pa'i bram ze rnams 'dus par gyur te de dag gis bsam pa/ mchod sbyin byed pa gang
160a4(mdo sde): du 'thab mo dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'gyed pa dang / rtsod pa 'byung ba'i mchod sbyin de ni/ mi 'grub bo snyam mo/ /de nas phyi zhig na mchod sbyin byed pa der ljongs
160a5(mdo sde): na gnas pa'i bram ze dang / mthil na gnas pa'i bram ze yon gyi phyir 'dus pa rnams 'thab mo byung nas mthil na gnas pa'i bram ze rnams kyis smras pa/ khyed
160a6(mdo sde): ni| zhing blas kyis 'tsho ba tshol ba yin pas na/ yon 'di rnams ni/ khyod la 'os pa ma yin no/ /nged ni/ yon gyi gnas yin pas na/ yon 'di rnams ni/ nged
160a7(mdo sde): la 'os so/ /zhes zer ro/ /ljongs na gnas pa rnams na re/ kye/ khyed rnams kyang rgyal po'i dpa' bo la brten pa yin pas na/ khyod ni/ yon gyi gnas ma yin
160b1(mdo sde): gyi| nged ni/ yon gnas yin pas na/ yon gyi 'os yin no/ /zhes zer nas de dag der 'thab mo dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'gyed pa dang / rtsod pas g.yon spyo zhing 'khod
160b2(mdo sde): pa'i skabs su bram ze gzhan zhig gis mchod sbyin byed pa'i gnas de nas gser dngul dang / bza' ba dang / bca' ba mang po khyer te bros pa las/ de bram ze de dag
160b3(mdo sde): gis bzung nas khu tshur dang rdog pa dag gis shin tu zhen par brdegs te bor ro/ /de nas de brdegs btsogs pas 'chi bas 'jigs shing skrag nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi
160b4(mdo sde): tshal du zhugs so/ /de der zhugs nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyod lam mdzes shing sgra bskyungs te ca co med par 'khod pa mthong ngo / /mthong ma
160b5(mdo sde): thag tu de bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dga' bar gyur to/ /de dga' bar gyur nas bsam pa/ bdag bram ze byed pas chog gi /bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la
160b6(mdo sde): r ab tu 'byung bar bya'o snyam nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar
160b7(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos
161a1(mdo sde): 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na/ bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par
161a2(mdo sde): spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba'i tshig gis rab tu phyung ste bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas de la lung
161a3(mdo sde): yang phog ste/ des kyang brtson pa dang / sgrub pa dang / 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ des dgra bcom pa
161a4(mdo sde): nyid thob nas bsam pa/ bdag gis gdul bar bya ba 'ga' lta ci yod snyam ste des bltas na/ mchod sbyin gyi bdag po la sogs pa bram ze stong phrag mang po 'dul
161a5(mdo sde): b ar 'gyur ba mthong nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal nas mi snang bar gyur te gnas de nyid nas nam mkha' las mchod sbyin gyi gnas der song nas mchod sbyin gyi
161a6(mdo sde): bdag po dang / bram ze gzhan de dag gis dge slong de steng gi nam mkha' las 'ong ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang de dag dge slong de la shin tu dga' bar gyur to/ /
161a7(mdo sde): dga' bar gyur nas de rnams kyis spang du 'khyud de stan la bzhag nas rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'khod do/ /de nas dge slong des de
161b1(mdo sde): dag la de dag dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te/ des na mchod sbyin gyi bdag po dang / bram ze de dag gis stan de dag nyid la 'khod bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i
161b2(mdo sde): rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/ /'khor de dag gi nang nas phal cher ni/ sangs rgyas la gzhol pa
161b3(mdo sde): dang / chos la 'bab pa dang / dge 'dun la bab par byas te bkod do/ /de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ bram ze

161b6(mdo sde): gyur to| |gsol pa/ 'dis smon lam gang du btab lags/ dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye rgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa
161b7(mdo sde): na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang
162a1(mdo sde): mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i tshe wA ra NA si na bram ze zhig gnas pa las
162a2(mdo sde): gtan tshigs snga ma bzhin du gyur te/ rab tu byung nas des tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas 'chi khar smon lam btab pa/ 'di ltar bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs

162a7(mdo sde): lam btab ste/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag
162b1(mdo sde): gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig/ mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig /de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid

162b3(mdo sde): pa dang / mdzad pa mnyam pa dang / thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas 'dis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas la/ nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu

162b6(mdo sde): na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba dgu'am/ bcu lon pa dang bu btsas te/ rigs dang mthun par ming btags nas de 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun

163a1(mdo sde): bco lnga'i nyin par bsad bar byed de/ ras 'ga' ni/ grong khyer bltar 'gro'o/ /res 'ga' ni/ mu stegs bltar 'gro ba'am/ lha bltar 'gro
163a2(mdo sde): ba'am/ yam bsreg shing 'thur 'gro'o/ /de nas phyi zhig na bram ze'i khye'u de bsang dus la bab nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ngo / /de nas de'i tshe bcom

163b5(mdo sde): khye'u des ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gral gyi gtso la bzhugs par mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bram ze'i khye'u des bcom ldan 'das bde bar bzhugs par rig nas
163b6(mdo sde): bza' ba dang / bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang pos tshim par byas te bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang mchod sbyin gyi gnas de longs spyod nas mi snang bar bram ze thams cad la
163b7(mdo sde): 'od zer btang nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du gshegs so/ /de nas bram ze de dag gis mchod sbyin gyi gnas thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang
164a1(mdo sde): de dag na re/ bdag cag gi mchod sbyin grub bo/ /zhes zer ro/ /kha cig na re/ bdag cag gi mchod sbyin gyi gnas su mi mjed kyi bdag po
164a2(mdo sde): tshangs pa byung ngo / /zhes zer ro/ /gzhan kha cig na re/ 'di ni/ tshangs pa ma yin gyi/ dbang phyug de bdag cag gi mchod sbyin gyi gnas su gshegs so/ /zhes zer ro/ /

164a5(mdo sde): ze'i khye'u la yi dam ches nas bram ze'i khye'us smras pa/ bdag gis sang nang par khyed kyi mngon sum du 'gyur bar bya'o/ /zhes byas nas bram ze'i khye'u des phyi nyin
164a6(mdo sde): b ram ze thams cad tshogs pa'i nang du bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal logs su phyogs
164a7(mdo sde): te thal mo sbyar nas sems bskyed de tshig tu smras pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ni/ 'di lta ste/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba
164b1(mdo sde): ci yang mi mkhyen pa'am/ mi gzigs pa'am/ mi rtogs pa'am/ thugs su mi chud pa ci yang mi mnga' na/ kye ma bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi
164b2(mdo sde): dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu bdag cag gi mchod sbyin gyi gnas 'dir gshegs te longs spyod par gsol zhes byas so/ /de nas de skad ces brjod pa'i mod la
164b3(mdo sde): b com ldan 'das dge slong mang pos zham ring byas te dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas nam mkha' las mchod sbyin gyi gnas dor gshegs te mi

172a3(mdo sde): bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po yin no/ /rgyal po chen po/ rang gi stan gang yin pa la 'dug cig /de nas yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos bcom
172a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go / yul ma ga d+ha'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag kha cig ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag

172a7(mdo sde): ni| thag ring po zhig nas bcom ldan 'das mthong nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can yang 'khor de nyid du 'dus te 'dug
172b1(mdo sde): go / de nas yul ma ga d+ha'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ ci dge sbyong chen po de 'od srung gi thad na tshangs par spyad pa spyod dam/ 'on te lteng rgyas 'od srung ral
172b2(mdo sde): pa can dge sbyong chen po'i thad na tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig gu snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yul ma ga d+ha'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyi sems thugs kyis

179a3(mdo sde): dang bu ram shing dang ba lang dang ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/ gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la bu gcig pa sdug pa la bya ba bzhin rgyal srid byed do/ /de nas rgyal po de

179a5(mdo sde): mdzes pa zhig btsas te/ de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas ming rdul zhes bya bar btags so/ /de nas khye'u rdul pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma
179a6(mdo sde): ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'khru ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse ba'i ma ma gnyis te/ ma ma brgyad la gtad nas de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang /
179a7(mdo sde): mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par bzang ngo cog gis bskyed bsrings te/ mtsho'i nang gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/ /de nas de gang gi tshe cher
179b1(mdo sde): skyes pa de'i tshe khye'u de yi ge slob tu bcug ste rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po rnams kyi bzo'i gnas dang / las kyi gnas tha dad pa 'di lta ste/ glang po che zhon
179b2(mdo sde): pa dang / rta zhon pa dang / mtshon cha bcang ba dang / 'phong dang / mdun du bsnur ba dang / phyir bsnur ba dang / g.yul las thar par bya ba dang / lcags kyus gzung ba dang /
179b3(mdo sde): zhags pas gzung ba dang / mda' bo che 'phang ba dang / rdo rje rtse gcig pa 'phang ba dang / mtshon rtse gcig pa gdab pa dang / 'khor lo 'phang ba dang / gcad pa dang / gsheg
179b4(mdo sde): pa dang / lag pas gzung ba dang / rkang ba'i stabs dang / mgo bo bskyab pa dang / rgyang mar 'phang ba dang / sgra grags par 'phang ba dang / gnad du 'phang ba dang / gdon mi
179b5(mdo sde): za bar phog par bya ba dang / tshabs cher btab pa rnams kyang bslabs nas gnas lnga la byang bar gyur to/ /rgyal po phyogs kyi bdag po'i mdun na 'don ni/ bram ze khyab 'jug
179b6(mdo sde): ces bya ba yin te/ de yang mkhas shing gsal la yid gzhungs pa/ rtsis mgo'i thabs shes pa'i shes rab dang dpyod pa dang ldan pa zhig ste/ de rgyal po phyogs kyi bdag po'i
179b7(mdo sde): rgyal po'i 'phrin las su bya ba thams cad byed la/ rgyal po phyogs kyi bdag pos kyang mdun na 'don bram ze khyab 'jug de la rgyal srid gtad nas khang bzang gi steng na 'dug
180a1(mdo sde): cing / bud med 'ba' zhig dang sil snyan gyis rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod do/ /phyi zhig na bram ze khyab 'jug gi chung ma la bu chags nas de
180a2(mdo sde): zla ba dgu'am/ bcu lon pa dang / bu gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas te/ de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas ming me skyong zhes btags so/ /
180a3(mdo sde): de nas khye'u ma skyong 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khus bskyed bsrings nas de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe yi ge dang / bram ze'i spyod lam
180a4(mdo sde): dang / spyod pa dang / oM zhes bya ba dang / b+ho zhes bya ba dang / gtsang sbra dang / cho ga dang / thal ba blang ba dang / ril ba thogs pa dang / nges brjod kyi rig byed dang / mchod
180a5(mdo sde): sbyin gyi rig byed dang / snyan tshig gi rig byed dang / srid srung gi rig byed dang / mchod sbyin bya ba dang / mchod sbyin byed du gzhug pa dang / sbyin pa dang / blang ba dang / kha
180a6(mdo sde): ton bya ba dang / kha ton slob tu gzhug pa'i thabs bslabs nas las rnam pa drug la mkhas pa'i bram zer gyur te de mthar gyis rig pa'i gnas bco brgyad la byung bar
180a7(mdo sde): gyur to| / de nas de'i phas khye'u me skyong la smras pa/ bu/ khye'u 'di ni/ yab 'das pa'i 'og tu yab kyi thabs kyis rgyal sar 'jug par 'gyur la/ khyod ni/ 'di'i mdun
180b1(mdo sde): nas 'don du 'gyur gyi/ 'di la khyod kyis skor cig /snga nas skor dang khyod la 'bras bu yod par 'gyur ro/ /me skyong gis smras pa/ jo bos ji skad bka' stsal pa bzhin du 'tshal lo/ /
180b2(mdo sde): zhes smras nas gzhon nu rdul gyi phyi bzhin du grib ma bzhin du 'brang ngo / /de nas phyi zhig na bram ze khyab 'jug shi nas de shi ba'i phyir rgyal po phyogs kyi bdag po shin tu mya ngan
180b3(mdo sde): byed cing sdug bsngal la smre sngags 'don par byed do/ /de nas gzhon nu rdul gyis gsol pa/ lha/ khyod ci'i slad du bram ze khyab 'jug gum pa'i slad du shin tu thugs ngan mdzad
180b4(mdo sde): cing 'o brgyal la smre sngags 'don cing bzhugs/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bram ze khyab 'jug ni/ nga'i rgyal po'i 'phrin las su bya ba thams cad byed byed de/ de'i mthus nga snying khral
180b5(mdo sde): chung dur 'dug go / gzhon nu rdul gyis gsol pa/ lha/ khyod bram ze khyab 'jug gum pa'i slad du ha cang thugs ngan ma mdzad/ ha cang 'o brgyal bar ma mdzad/ ha cang smre sngags
180b6(mdo sde): 'don par ma mdzad cig dang / lha mkhan po de nyid kyi bu bram ze'i khye'u me skyong zhes bya ba pha bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa zhig mchis pa de lhas mdun na 'don du bsgo
180b7(mdo sde): bar gsol/ 'on tang des lha'i rgyal po'i 'phrin las su bgyi ba thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /de nas de thos ma thag tu rgyal po phyogs kyi bdag pos bram ze'i khye'u me skyong
181a1(mdo sde): 'gugs pa btang nas mdun na 'don du bcug go / de nas des kyang rgyal po de'i bya ba thams cad nyams su blangs so/ /de nas phyi zhig na rgyal po phyogs
181a2(mdo sde): kyi bdag pos gzhon nu rdul rgyal sar bcug nas phyogs kyi bdag po shi'o/ /de nas de'i ming gzhon nu rdul zhes bya ba de med par gyur nas rgyal po rdul zhes bya bar gyur to//
181a3(mdo sde): de nas rgyal po rdul gyis kyang bram ze'i khye'u me skyong 'gugs pa btang nas de la smras pa/ mkhan po/ khyod kyis ji ltar nga'i yab kyi rgyal po'i 'phrin las su bya ba thams cad

181a5(mdo sde): bya ba thams cad nyams su blangs so/ /de nas de'i ming me skyong zhes bya ba gang yin pa de med par gyur nas me skyong khyab 'jug ces bya bar gyur to/ /de'i tshe rgyal po rdul gyi sngon
181a6(mdo sde): gzhon nu'i tshe mdza' zhing bshes la gtsugs pa/ rgyal rigs gzhon nu drug cig yod pa de dag rgyal po de'i thad du 'ongs nas smras pa/ lhas bdag cag gi yul dbog tu
181a7(mdo sde): gsol/ de nas de thos ma thag tu rgyal pos me skyong khyab 'jug la bka' stsal te/ mkhan po/ khyod kyis sa chen po 'di cha bdun du bgos la/ cha drug ni/ gzhon nu 'di rnams

181b2(mdo sde): gzhon nu drug po rnams la byin no/ /cha gcig ni/ rgyal po rdul gyi skal bar lus shing 'dug go /de nas rgyal po rdul gyis rgyal rigs drug po de dag rang rang gi rgyal srid la
181b3(mdo sde): bkod do/ /de nas me skyong khyab 'jug ni/ 'dzam bu gling thams cad du tshangs par bkur te/ bram ze khyab 'jug ni/ tshangs pa'i lam yin no snyam du 'dzin cing tshangs pa'i
181b4(mdo sde): lam yin par blta'o/ /de nas phyi zhig na bram ze khyab 'jug 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag ni/ rgyal khams thams cad kyi mi rnams kyis tshangs par bkur te/ bram ze khyab
181b5(mdo sde): 'jug ni/ tshangs pa'i lam yin no snyam du 'dzin cing tshangs pa'i lam yin par lta la/ gna'i bram ze rgas shing 'khogs la gtugs pa/ sde tshan gyi slob dpon chen po dag
181b6(mdo sde): las bdag gis thos na/ bram ze gang gis dbyar zla ba bzhi'i bar du byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gnas pa de la mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa bltar 'ong ngo / /zhes
181b7(mdo sde): zer gyi/ ma la bdag gis thams cad spangs te khang bzang gi steng du song la byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gnas par bya
182a1(mdo sde): gor ma chag snyam nas rgyal po la gsol pa/ lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ bdag ni/ dbyar zla ba bzhir tshangs pa'i gnas pas gnas

182b1(mdo sde): lus su shes/ /khyab 'jug de ltar shes par gyis/ /bram ze che zhing mtho ba khyab 'jug gis smras pa/ tshangs pa khyod la 'dud par bgyi/ /tshangs pa khyod la mchod par 'tshal na/

186a3(mdo sde): shes pa lnga bskyed do/ /de nas bram ze che zhing mtho ba khyab 'jug gi ming bram ze che zhing mtho ba khyab 'jug ces bya bar gyur pa de med par gyur nas ston pa khyab 'jug
186a4(mdo sde): ces bya bar gyur to/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe ston pa khyab 'jug ces bya bar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ nga nyid yin no/ /de'i tshe rgyal po rdul ces bya
186a5(mdo sde): bar gyur pa gang len pa de ni/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po 'di kho na yin no/ /de'i tshe rgyal po rdul gyis mgo drangs pa'i skye bo 'bum phrag du mar gyur pa gang yin pa
186a6(mdo sde): de dag ni/ rgyal po gzugs can snying pos mgo drangs pa'i lha brgyad khri dang / yul ma ga d+ha'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag stong phrag du ma mang po 'di dag kho na yin te/ de'i
186a7(mdo sde): tshe yang ngas rgyal po rdul la sogs pa yul gyi mi du ma dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag stong phrag du ma rab tu byung nas bsam gtan bzhi dang / mngon par shes
186b1(mdo sde): pa lnga la bkod de/ gzhi des na nga'i grags pas 'jig rten rgyas par gyur to/ /da ltar yang ngas rgyal po gzugs can snying po la sogs pa lha brgyad khri dang / ma ga d+ha'i
186b2(mdo sde): bram ze dang / khyim bdag stong phrag du ma dam pa'i chos kyi bcud kyis tshim par byas nas g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa/ grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das
186b3(mdo sde): pa la bkod do/ / //las brgya tham pa/ bam po sum cu bdun pa ste tha ma/ 'thab mo zhes bya ba ni/ gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na skye bo phal
186b4(mdo sde): po che 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'gyed pa dang / rtsod pa la zhugs shing 'khod do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam ston pa/
186b5(mdo sde): rnam pa gnyis kyi shes bya dang ye shes la mnga' brnyes pa/ ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum la mkhas pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi 'jigs pa/ 'gro
186b6(mdo sde): lngar 'gro ba las rnam par grol ba/ skye mched drug la mkhas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod yul pa/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa/ mthar
186b7(mdo sde): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la snyoms par 'jug pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/ yang dag pa'i seng+ge'i sgra chen po sgrog pa rnams ni/ chos nyid kyis
187a1(mdo sde): nyin dus gsum/ mtshan dus gsum ste nyin mtshan dus drug tu sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/ su ni/ rgud/ su
187a2(mdo sde): ni| dar/ su ni/ phongs shing 'dug /su ni/ nyam nga bar gyur/ su ni/ gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni/ phongs pa dang nyam nga ba dang gnod pa dang ldan/ su ni/ ngan song du
187a3(mdo sde): gzhol| su ni/ ngan song du 'bab/ su ni/ ngan song du bab/ su ni/ ngas ngan song nas phyung ste mtho ris dang thar pa dang 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/ su ni/ nyes
187a4(mdo sde): par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang bar bya/ su ni/ 'phags pa'i nor bdun med pa las 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug
187a5(mdo sde): par bya| su ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ma bskyed pa las bskyed par bya/ su ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed zin pa las yongs su smin par bya/ su ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams
187a6(mdo sde): yongs su smin zin pa las ye shes kyi mtshon gyis brtol bar bya/ su la ni/ sangs rgyas byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten 'bras bu yod par bya snyam du ye shes gzigs
187a7(mdo sde): pa 'jug go / rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas/ /dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid/ /gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la/ /sangs rgyas dus las yol ba med/ /de
187b1(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ skye bo phal che gdul ba'i dus la bab ste/ de dag ngas 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'gyed pa dang / rtsod pa las bzlog ste g.yung
187b2(mdo sde): drung gi mthar thug pa/ grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la dgod par bya'o snyam du dgongs nas snga dro sham thabs dang / chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas mnyan
187b3(mdo sde): du yod par bsod snyoms la gshegs te/ skye bo phal po che ga la ba der gshegs nas skye bo phal po che de dag gis thag ring po zhig nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong
187b4(mdo sde): ngo / /mthong nas kyang ngo mtshar bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gdan bshams nas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa legs so legs so/ /bcom ldan 'das/
187b5(mdo sde): tshur gshegs/ bzhugs su gsol/ de nas gdan bshams pa la bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo phal po che la bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag /ci byed cing 'khod/ gzhan
187b6(mdo sde): dang 'thab dgos na/ gzhan dang 'thab cing 'dug gam/ de rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag su dang 'thab 'tshal lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
187b7(mdo sde): pa| grogs po dag / 'o na 'khod cig dang / ngas khyod la rgyas par brjod par bya'o/ /de nas skye bo phal po che de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal
188a1(mdo sde): te chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo phal po che de dag la bka' stsal pa/ khyed ni/ nyon mongs
188a2(mdo sde): pa rnams dang 'thab dgos kyi/ nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir 'bad par gyis shig ces bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la de lta bu dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te/ des na
188a3(mdo sde): d e dag gi khro ba'i kun nas dkris pa med par gyur nas stan de dag nyid la 'khod bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun
188a4(mdo sde): du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ de dag gis bden pa mthong nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo
188a5(mdo sde): sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par
188a6(mdo sde): rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na/ bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
188a7(mdo sde): kyis de dag dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba'i tshig gis rab tu phyung ste bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas de dag la lung yang phog ste/ de dag gis kyang brtson pa dang /
188b1(mdo sde): sgrub pa dang / 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ de dag dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags
188b2(mdo sde): dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan+dan spangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/
188b3(mdo sde): rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/
188b4(mdo sde): dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan
188b5(mdo sde): 'das la gsol pa/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo phal po che 'thab pa las zhi bar mdzad nas g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa/ grub pa dang bde ba'i mya
188b6(mdo sde): ngan las 'das pa la bkod pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/ 'das pa'i dus na yang ngas skye bo phal po che 'di
188b7(mdo sde): dag bsam gtan bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la ji ltar bkod pa de nyon cig /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na ri khrod kyi grong zhig gis mchod sbyin byas
189a1(mdo sde): te mchod sbyin byed pa der bram ze rnams stan gyi phyir 'thab pa las/ de'i tshe dka' thub kyi gnas shig na drang srong 'khor lnga brgya yod
189a2(mdo sde): pa zhig gnas so/ /de nas mchod sbyin byed pa der drang srong des bram ze de dag 'thab pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir de lta bu dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te/ des na 'thab mo de yang
189a3(mdo sde): zhi bar gyur la/ bram ze rnams kyang skyo ba skyes nas de nyid kyi thad du rab tu byung ngo / /de dag der rab tu byung nas bsam gtan bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do/ /
189a4(mdo sde): dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe drang srong du gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni/ nga nyid yin no/ /de'i tshe bram ze lnga brgyar
189a5(mdo sde): gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ skye bo phal po che 'di dag kho na yin no/ /de'i tshe yang ngas skye bo phal po che 'thab pa zhi bar byas nas bsam gtan bzhi dang / mngon par
189a6(mdo sde): shes pa lnga la bkod do/ /de ltar yang ngas skye bo phal po che 'thab pa zhi bar byas nas g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa/ grub pa dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la
189a7(mdo sde): bkod do/ /gzhan yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la 'di dag thams cad rab tu byung nas der 'di rnams kyis tshe gcig tu tshangs par
189b1(mdo sde): spyod pa spyad nas dbang po rnams yongs su smin par byas pa des na/ da ltar rnam par grol bar gyur to// //klu zhes bya ba ni/ gleng gzhi mnyan du
189b2(mdo sde): yod pa na bzhugs te/ de'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi blon po chen po zhig yod cig la btags te ci bdog pa 'phrog nas khri mon du bcug pa las/ de der zas dang skom gyis
189b3(mdo sde): mnar te shi'o/ /de nas des smon lam log par btab nas shi 'phos te dus las 'das pa'i 'og tu gnod sbyin ma rungs pa zhig tu skyes nas des yul ko sa la de thams
189b4(mdo sde): cad du mi nad btang ste/ skye bo phal po che dag kha btag par gyur nas ltas mkhan dag gis smras pa/ blon po chen po des 'chi khar smon lam log par btab nas gnod
189b5(mdo sde): sbyin ma rungs par skyes te/ des mi nad 'di dag btang ngo / /zhes byas so/ /de nas de thos ma thag tu skye bo mang po de dag ci bya gtol med par gyur to/ /de nas rgyal po gsal
189b6(mdo sde): rgyal gyis bsam pa/ 'di ni/ sus kyang gdul bar mi nus kyi/ da 'di'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba gdab dgos so snyam ste bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der
189b7(mdo sde): song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das
190a1(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ni/ klu ma rungs pa dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo la sogs pa gzhan
190a2(mdo sde): dang gzhan dag kyang btul/ gnod sbyin ma rungs pa 'brog gnas la sogs pa gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang btul na/ btsun pa/ blon po chen po che ge mo zhig
190a3(mdo sde): gis smon lam log par btab ste gnod sbyin ma rungs par skyes nas des bdag gi yul du mi nad btang na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du gnod
190a4(mdo sde): sbyin ma rungs pa de gdul bar gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gsal rgyal la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan
190a5(mdo sde): 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de rjes su yi rang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ngo / /de
190a6(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis gnod sbyin de rgyal po rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi 'dabs su bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de gdul ba'i phyir me chen po sprul te/ /de'i
190a7(mdo sde): khor khor yug nas bdag nyid me chen pos 'khor bar mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung 'ba' zhig zhi bar mthong ngo / /de nas de 'jigs shing skrag nas
190b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin ma rungs pa de la bka' stsal pa/ bzhin bzang / khyod kyis sngon mi dge ba'i las byas bas
190b2(mdo sde): rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bsad pa yin na/ da yang khyod 'dir skyes nas skye bo mang po kha 'dog par byed na/ 'di nas shi 'phos pa'i 'og tu khyod kyi 'gro ba ni/ gang yin/ skye bos
190b3(mdo sde): ni| gang yin/ 'gro ba'i sa ni/ gang yin/ gnod sbyin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sdig pa'i las
190b4(mdo sde): 'di thong zhig / gnod sbyin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la bka' ci stsal ba bzhin du 'tshal lo/ /de skad ces gsol te/ des skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
190b5(mdo sde): bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa| btsun pa/ bdag gis sdig pa'i las btang lags te/ btsun pa/ deng slan chad mnyan du yod pa
190b6(mdo sde): na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po rnams kyi srung ma dang / skyong pa ni/ bdag lags so/ /de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ btsun pa/
190b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin ma rungs ba de btul nas skye bo phal po che de dag 'jigs pa med pa'i gnas su bkod pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
191a1(mdo sde): stsal pa| da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/ 'das pa'i dus na yang ngas gnod sbyin ma rungs pa 'di btul nas skye bo phal po che ji ltar 'jigs
191a2(mdo sde): pa med pa'i gnas su bkod pa de nyon cig / dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer wA ra NA si na rgyal po tshangs bas byin rgyal po byed de/ de'i tshe yul ka shir
191a3(mdo sde): klu gdug pa dug mi bzad pa zhig byung ste/ des grong yang stong par byed/ ljongs kyang stong par byed cing / wA ra NA si'i phyogs su chas pa las/ rgyal po tshangs
191a4(mdo sde): pas byin gyis thos nas de thos ma thag tu 'jigs pa chen po skyes te/ des dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon te btang nas khyed deng la klu gdug pa de sod cig
191a5(mdo sde): ces bsgo'o/ /de nas de dag gis rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te gsol pa/ lha/ de ni/ dpung gi tshogs kyis dgum par mi nus kyi/ sngags sam sman gyis de dgum par nus
191a6(mdo sde): lags so/ /yang na dge ba'i tshul gyis bkur ba'i dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis gdul bar nus lags so/ /zhes gsol to/ /de nas de'i tshe wA ra NA si de nyid na gdol
191a7(mdo sde): pa'i khye'u byams pa'i rang bzhin can/ snying rje che ba/ sems can la byams pa zhig gnas pa des skye bo mang po de dag ci bya gtol med par gyur pa mthong nas mthong ma thag
191b1(mdo sde): tu de snying rje skyes nas des skye bo mang po rnams la smras pa/ khyed ci bya gtol med par bya mi dgos kyi/ bdag gis klu gdug pa de gdul bar bya'o/ /zhes byas so/ /de nas de'i pha ma
191b2(mdo sde): gnyis na re/ de ni/ dbugs gdug pa yin te/ khyod kyis de 'dul mi nus so/ /khye'us smras pa/ byams pa'i go cha gyon pa la des cung zad kyang gnod par byed mi nus
191b3(mdo sde): so| / zhes byas nas khye'u des phyogs gang na klu gdug pa de 'dug pa'i phyogs der song nas klu gdug pa des thag ring po zhig nas khye'u de mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang khros nas
191b4(mdo sde): khye'u de la dbugs btang ngo / /de nas khye'u de byams pa la snyoms par zhugs nas byams pa'i lta bas klu gdug pa de la bltas te/ des bltas ma thag tu dug med par gyur
191b5(mdo sde): to| / de nas khye'u des klu sbrul de lag pa gnyis kyis blangs nas mi mi gnas pa'i sa phyogs su bzhag go /de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin dang / skye bo mang po gzhan dag gis
191b6(mdo sde): gdol ba'i khye'u che ge mo zhig gis klu gdug pa btul lo/ /zhes thos nas thos ma thag tu rgyal po de rang nyid gdol pa'i khye'u de'i thad du song nas des khye'u de la dam pa sna
191b7(mdo sde): gcig sbyin no/ /zhes byas so/ /khye'us smras pa/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs te gnas par mdzod cig /yul na gnas pa'i mi rnams
192a1(mdo sde): kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la gzung bar mdzod cig ces byas so/ /de nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis khye'u de la longs spyod kyi
192a2(mdo sde): dbyings chen po byin nas dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs te 'dug go / yul na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod do/ /

192a4(mdo sde): gdug par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ gnod sbyin ma rungs pa 'di kho na yin no/ /de'i tshe skye bo phal po cher gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ yul ko sa la na gnas
192a5(mdo sde): pa'i skye bo mang po 'di dag kho na yin te/ de'i tshe yang ngas klu gdug pa btul nas skye bo phal po che 'jigs pa med pa'i gnas su bkod do/ /de ltar yang ngas gnod

192a7(mdo sde): la 'di dag thams cad dge bsnyen du gyur te/ der 'di rnams kyis tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas dbang po rnams yongs su smin par byas pa des na/ da ltar
192b1(mdo sde): rnam par grol bar gyur to/ / //shi bi gnyis zhes bya ba de la/ shi bi dang po ni/ bcom ldan 'das gyad kyi yul du ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las/ chu klung 'thab
192b2(mdo sde): ldan dang / grong khyer ku shi'i bar gyi lam nas gud du bzur te tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla gos

192b6(mdo sde): gsol| |de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gos snam sbyar stug po blta bas te 'phongs su bzhag nas snang ba'i 'du shes dang ldan pa dang / dran pa dang
192b7(mdo sde): ldan pa dang / shes bzhin dang ldan pa'i 'du shes thugs la dgongs shing glo g.yas phyogs kyis gzims te zhabs gcig gi steng du gcig bzhag go/
193a1(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ 'khor 'dir so so'i skye bo'i dge slong ji snyed 'dus shing tshogs pa de dag thams
193a2(mdo sde): cad ci sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba yin nam/ 'on te nyan thos kyis 'dul ba yin zhig gu snyam du dgongs so/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs
193a3(mdo sde): pa| |'di na kha cig ni/ sangs rgyas kyis 'dul bar 'gyur ro/ /kha cig ni/ nyan thos kyis 'dul bar 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'

193a5(mdo sde): 'khor thams cad du sgra des gang bar 'gyur ba de lta bur byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas dge slong mang po dag gis tshig de lta bu gsung ba'i sgra thos nas de

193a7(mdo sde): l dan pa kun dga' bos sbrang bu'i sbrang rtsi btsir ba bzhin chos snyan no cog ston par 'gyur snyam ste bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas
193b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la bskor te 'khod do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos dge slong rnams la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan
193b2(mdo sde): lag dben pa la brten pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la brten pa/ 'gog pa la brten pa/ rnam par spong pas yongs su bsgyur ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi mngon
193b3(mdo sde): par shes pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas bstan to/ /tshe dang ldan pa dag /chos rnam par 'byed pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / dga' ba dang / shin tu
193b4(mdo sde): sbyangs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la brten pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la brten pa/ 'gog pa brten pa/ rnam
193b5(mdo sde): par spong bas yongs su bsgyur ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi mngon par shes pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas bstan to/ /zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun
193b6(mdo sde): dga' bos byang chub kyi yan lag 'di dag nyid las brtsams nas dge slong rnams la de lta bu dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te/ des na nyan thos dang dge ba'i rtsa ba
193b7(mdo sde): 'brel ba gang yin pa de dag gis stan de dag nyid la 'khod bzhin du nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /de nas bcom
194a1(mdo sde): l dan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i gtam gyi mjug rdzogs par thugs su chud nas bzhugs te skyil mo krung bcas nas
194a2(mdo sde): sku drang por bsrang ste dran pa mngon tu bzhag nas bzhugs te bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/
194a3(mdo sde): khyod brtson 'grus ston tam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ brtson 'grus ston lags/ bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod brtson 'grus ston tam/
194a4(mdo sde): gsol pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ brtson 'grus ston lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ brtson 'grus ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
194a5(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ba'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub kyi phyogs 'di dag nyid las brtsams nas de lta bu dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te/ des
194a6(mdo sde): n a bcom ldan 'das dang dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 'brel ba gang yin pa de dag gis stan de dag nyid la 'khod bzhin du nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas
194a7(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byas te/ de dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa'i 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/
194b1(mdo sde): nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan+dan spangs pa lta bur bsil par gyur pa/ rig pas sgo nga'i spubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang mngon
194b2(mdo sde): par shes pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams
194b3(mdo sde): kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang gus par smra ba'i gnas su gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe dge slong zhig gis tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ snyan pa'i chos ni gsan pa'i phyir/ /
194b4(mdo sde): ston pa snyun bzhin nyid kyis bskul/ /khyod la byang chub yan lag rnams/ /yod na dge slong chos shod cig /gnas brtan kun dga' mkhas shing grags/ /
194b5(mdo sde): byang bar gyur pas legs zhes gsol/ /dpa' bo khyod kyi gsung rab la/ /dkar pa'i chos rnams de dag mnga'/ /dran dang rnam 'byed brtson 'grus dang / /
194b6(mdo sde): dga' dang rab sbyangs ting 'dzin dang / /btang snyoms 'di dag rdul med pa/ /khyod kyi byang chub yan lag lags/ /byang chub yan lag bcud thos nas/ /byang chub
194b7(mdo sde): yan lag bcud kyang rtogs/ /bcom ldan snyun tsha bas che ba las/ /gnod pa de las bzhengs par gyur/ /dam chos rin chen 'di ston pa'i/ /chos kyi mnga' bdag
195a1(mdo sde): de nyid kyang / /dam chos gsan par bzhed gyur na/ /gzhan lta ji ltar de ni nyan/ /stobs bcu mnga' bas nye rgyal ni/ /dge slong
195a2(mdo sde): rnams kyi shes rab mchog / bstan pa gang yin de nyid kyang / /chos nyan 'dod pas gzir bar gyur/ /mdo sde 'dul ba ma mo 'dzin/ /mkhas shing tshul
195a3(mdo sde): dang tshul min shes/ /de dag dam chos nyan byed na/ /gzhan lta ji ltar de mi nyan/ /mkhas pa shes 'dod sems bzhag nas/ /chos bzhin nyan par
195a4(mdo sde): byed pa ni/ /sangs rgyas gsung rab skyon med la/ /de bzhin dga' ba thob par 'gyur/ /yid dga' lus kyang shin tu sbyangs/ /bde ba yang ni myong bar 'gyur//
195a5(mdo sde): bde bar gyur nas sems nyid kyi/ /ting 'dzin la yang reg par 'gyur/ /sems ni mnyam par bzhag pa yis/ /'du byed yul gyi rnam pa rig /srid pa'i 'gro
195a6(mdo sde): las skyo bar 'gyur/ /chags med sems kyis grol bar 'gyur/ /rtag tu srid 'gro skyo gyur na/ /lha dang mi la chags pa med/ /bud shing med pa'i me bzhin du/ /
195a7(mdo sde): dgra bcom rnams ni mya ngan 'da'/ /dam chos mnyan pa'i phan yon ni/ /mang po gzhan yang rgyal bas bstan/ /de phyir 'dir ni yod snyam du/ /ston pa'i
195b1(mdo sde): bka' ni mnyan par bya/ /de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba/ btsun pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ legs par smras pa gsung pa dang /
195b2(mdo sde): legs par smras pa bzhed pa lags te/ legs par smras pa'i don gyi slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bskul ba mdzad nas
195b3(mdo sde): bkur sti dang ldan pas gsan kyang gsan/ bshad kyang bshad pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /de bzhin gshegs
195b4(mdo sde): pa ni| da ltar 'ba' zhig legs par smras pa gsung ba dang / legs par smras pa bzhed pa ma yin gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ 'das pa'i dus na yang
195b5(mdo sde): legs par smras pa gsung ba dang / legs par smras pa bzhed pa yin te/ legs par smras pa'i don gyi phyir ngas mchog tu dka' ba ji ltar spyad pa de nyon cig /
195b6(mdo sde): dge slong dag /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na rgyal po'i pho brang bzhi ldan zhes bya ba na rgyal po shi bi zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de/ de'i ring la 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba
195b7(mdo sde): dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang / rtsod pa dang 'thab mo zhi ba dang / 'khrug pa dang nang 'khrug dang chom rkun dang nad dang mu ge med pa
196a1(mdo sde): dang / 'bras sA lu dang bu ram shing dang ba lang dang ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/ gnod pa med cing tsher ma dkrugs la bu gcig
196a2(mdo sde): pa sdug ba la bya ba bzhin du chos bzhin du rgyal srid byed do/ /rgyal po de yang byams pa'i rang bzhin can/ snying rje dang ldan pa/ sems can la byams pa/ sbyin
196a3(mdo sde): pa la sred pa zhig ste/ de sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed pa la zhugs te/ zas 'dod pa la ni/ zas sbyin par byed/ skom 'dod pa la skom sbyin
196a4(mdo sde): par byed/ gos 'dod pa la ni/ gos sbyin par byed/ rgyan 'dod pa la ni/ rgyan sbyin par byed/ mal stan 'dod pa la ni/ mal stan sbyin par byed/ bzhon
196a5(mdo sde): pa 'dod pa la ni/ bzhon pa sbyin par byed/ yo byad gzhan 'dod pa la ni/ yo byad gzhan sbyin par byed do/ /nad gso ba'i nad brang bcas te yo byad thams
196a6(mdo sde): cad sbyar nas sman pa rnams dang / nad g.yogs rnams bskos te nad pa rnams dang / mgon med pa rnams kyi rim gro byed do/ /bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang ma
196a7(mdo sde): mang po dag kyang sta gon byas te nam mkha' la gnas pa dang / chu na gnas pa dang / thang la gnas pa'i srog chags rnams la sbyin par byed do/ /des yi dam
196b1(mdo sde): 'di lta bu yang bcas te/ deng phyin chad bdag gis thams cad la thams cad sbyin par bya ste/ 'jig rten dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la dgod par bya'o/ /zhes
196b2(mdo sde): dam bcas nas des 'jig rten thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bod do/ /der dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs pa'i phyir sems can
196b3(mdo sde): phal cher shi ba'i 'og tu lha'i nang du skyes nas de dag gis lha'i gnas rnams gang bar gyur to/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bsam pa/ 'di ci zhig sgrub/
196b4(mdo sde): brgya byin du 'gyur ba sgrub bam/ 'on te tshangs par 'gyur ba sgrub cig bsnyam mo/ /de nas des bltas na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub cing
196b5(mdo sde): 'dug go / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bsam pa/ ci 'di sems can brtan po yin nam/ 'on te sems can mi brtan pa yin pa bdag gis ja brtags
196b6(mdo sde): la gal te sems can brtan po yin na ni/ mchod bar bya'o/ /'di lta ste sems can brtan po ma yin na yang 'di'i sems stobs bskyed par bya'o snyam nas lha'i
196b7(mdo sde): d bang po brgya byin gyis bdag nyid srin po'i gzugs su mngon par sprul nas rgyal po shi bi'i khang bzang gi char khebs la 'dug ste tshigs su bcad pa'i phyed smras
197a1(mdo sde): pa| kye ma 'du byed rnams mi rtag / skye zhing 'jig pa'i chos can yin/ /zhes smras nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin mi ma yin pa'i cha lugs
197a2(mdo sde): can cang mi zer bar 'dug go / de nas rgyal po shi bis lha'i dbang po brgya byin mi ma yin pa'i cha lugs can gyis tshig de lta bu brjod pa thos so/ /thos nas
197a3(mdo sde): kyang des bsam pa/ gcig tu na ni/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i sgo phye'o/ /gcig tu na ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
197a4(mdo sde): kyi lam bstan to snyam mo/ /de nas rgyal po shi bis lha'i dbang po brgya byin mi ma yin pa'i cha lugs can khang bzang gi char khebs la 'dug pa mthong ngo //
197a5(mdo sde): mthong nas kyang skyen par langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te lha'i dbang po brgya byin mi ma yin pa'i cha lugs can ga la ba de logs su thal mo
197a6(mdo sde): sbyar ba btud nas smras pa/ grogs po/ tshigs su bcad pa de tshang par smros shig dang / bdag gis slob ma bgyis te mnyan to/ /brgya byin gyis smras pa/
197a7(mdo sde): khyod kyis bdag gi slob ma byas pas ci la phan/ bdag ni/ bkres shing skom pas gzir te ci bya gtol med par bla zhing 'dug go /byang chub sems dpas
197b1(mdo sde): smras pa| grogs po/ tshigs su bcad pa tshang bar smros shig dang / bdag gis khyod kha zas kyis tshim par bya'o/ /lha'i dbang po brgya byin mi ma yin gyi cha
197b2(mdo sde): lugs can gyis smras pa/ grogs po/ khyod kyis nga kha zas kyis tshim par byed nus sam/ nga'i kha zas dang skom ji lta bu yin pa de ni/ khyod kyis sbyin par dka'o|
197b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ khyod kyi zas skom ci yin/ des smras pa/ mi 'phral du bsad pa'i sha dron po ni/ za/ khrag dron po ni/ 'thung ngo / /de nas byang
197b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpas bsam pa/ de lta bu'i sha khrag ni/ gsod par ma byas kyi bar du mi rnyed la/ bdag gis legs par smras pa'i don gyi phyir sems can gzhan
197b5(mdo sde): su la yang gnod pa byed mi phod do snyam nas smras pa/ gal te bdag gi sha khrag khyod za zhing 'thung phod na ni/ grogs po/ bdag gis sbyin nus ches kyi/ tshigs su
197b6(mdo sde): bcad pa tshang bar smros shig dang / legs par smras pa'i don gyi phyir bdag gis khyod la rang gi sha khrag sbyin no/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshigs su
197b7(mdo sde): bcad pa tshang bar smras pa/ kye ma 'du byed rnams mi rtag /skye zhing 'jig pa'i chos can yin/ /skyes nas 'gag par 'gyur ba ste/ /de dag nye bar zhi ba bde/ /de nas
198a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpas tshigs su bcad pa tshang ba de gus par mnos nas yun ring mo zhig tu kha ton du sbyangs nas bsam pa/ 'di
198a2(mdo sde): ni| mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer gyi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i sgo yin no/ /'di ni/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer gyi lam yin no/ /lam
198a3(mdo sde): 'dis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad nges par 'byung ngo snyam nas mtshon cha rnon po blangs te smras pa/ grogs po/ legs par smras pa'i
198a4(mdo sde): don gyi phyir yon bzhes shig / ces byas nas brang gi phyogs gcig nas sha bcad de lha'i dbang po brgya byin mi ma yin pa'i cha lugs can la byin te smras pa/
198a5(mdo sde): grogs po/ 'grangs sam/ des smras pa/ ma 'grangs so/ /de bzhin du brang gi phyogs ya gcig nas bcad de byin no/ /de bzhin du dpung ba'i sha rnams nas
198a6(mdo sde): lus thams cad kyi sha bcad cing phyin nas smras pa/ grogs po/ 'grangs sam/ des smras pa/ ma 'grangs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ da ni/
198a7(mdo sde): lus ril gyis yongs su gtang ba'i dus kho na la bab bo snyam nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab ste/ kye ma dge ba'i
198b1(mdo sde): rtsa ba 'dis na/ bdag 'jig rten long ba/ 'dren pa med pa/ ston pa med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa
198b2(mdo sde): dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas
198b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das su gyur cig ces byas nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ sbyin pa chen por gyur pa 'di yis ni/ /srid pa dag tu rang byung sangs rgyas shog /
198b4(mdo sde): sngon gyi rgyal dbang rnams kyis ma bsgral ba'i/ /skye bo phal chen rgal nas bsgral bar bgyi/ /de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon
198b5(mdo sde): lam btab nas smras pa/ grogs po/ bdag gis lus 'di ci dga' bar gyis shig /de nas byang chub sems dpas sems bskyed ma thag tu sa rnam pa drug tu
198b6(mdo sde): g.yos so/ /nam mkha' la 'khod pa'i lha rnams kyis kyang me tog gi char phab nas legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin te/ grogs po/ legs so legs so/ /khyod kyis
198b7(mdo sde): mchog tu dka' ba'i las byas so/ /zhes 'dzer to/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bsam pa/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dis mchog tu dka' ba byas te/ bdag
199a1(mdo sde): gis 'di'i lus snga mkho bzhin du bsgyur bar ni/ nus mod kyi/ 'on kyang bdag gis 'di nyid kyi spro ba tshod zin par bskyed dgos
199a2(mdo sde): so snyam nas byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ grogs po/ khyod bdag gi sha rnams gcod cing rgyus pa dang rtsa brang breng rnams gseb na/ sems mi dga'
199a3(mdo sde): ba cung zad tsam ma skyes sam/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ grogs po/ bdag gi sha rnams gcod cing rgyus pa dang rtsa brang breng rnams gseb na/ sems
199a4(mdo sde): mi dga' ba cung zad kyang ma skyes kyi/ bdag sdug bsngal myong ba na sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags su skyes pa'i sems can rnams
199a5(mdo sde): 'ba' zhig la snying rje'i dbang du gyur to/ /lha'i dbang po brgya byin mi ma yin pa'i cha lugs can gyis smras pa/ grogs po/ khyod kyi tshig de la su zhig yid ches/
199a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ bdag gis khyod la bden pa bskul ba de lta bus yid ches par bstan to/ /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ de ltar khyod kyis bden
199a7(mdo sde): pa bskul bar chad na/ dze khyod bdag gi lus 'di bden pa bskul bas snga mkho bzhin du sgyur cig /de skad ces smras ma thag tu byang chub sems dpas smras
199b1(mdo sde): ba| bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis 'di ltar bdag gi sha rnams gcod cing rgyus ba dang rtsa brang breng rnams gsab na/ sems cung zad tsam yang mi dga'
199b2(mdo sde): ba ma skyes te/ bdag gis sdug bsngal myong ba na sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags su skyes pa'i sems can rnams 'ba' zhig la snying rje'i dbang du gyur na/ bden
199b3(mdo sde): ba dang bden pa'i tshig des bdag gi lus 'di snga mkho bzhin du gyur cig ces byas so/ /de skad ces brjod ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i lus snga mkho bzhin du gyur to/ /de
199b4(mdo sde): n as de mthong ma thag tu lha'i dbang po brgya byin yid rangs te cha lugs de med par byas nas rang bzhin gyi gzugs su bsgyur te byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas
199b5(mdo sde): smras pa| bdag gis khyod la gnod pa'i bsam bas mi dga' bar byas pa ma yin gyi/ khyod nyid kyi spro ba bskyed pa'i phyir bdag gis khyod mi dga' bar byas par zad do/ /khyod kyi
199b6(mdo sde): brtson 'gras 'di 'dra ba dang / spro ba 'di 'dra ba las na/ gdon mi za bar khyod yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur gyi/ de'i tshe bdag dran
199b7(mdo sde): par mdzod cig / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' la bzod pa gsol nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /dge slong dag /ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe rgyal po
200a1(mdo sde): shi bir gyur ba byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni/ nga nyid yin te/ de'i tshe yang legs par smras pas smra ba dang /
200a2(mdo sde): legs par smra bar 'dod par gyur na/ da ltar de bzhin gshegs par gyur pa na legs par smra bas smra ba dang / legs par smra bar 'dod par ci ste mi mdzad/ de ci'i phyir zhe
200a3(mdo sde): na| dge slong dag / nga ni/ chos rnams drang po byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro// //shi bi gnyis pa ni/ gtan tshigs dang / sngon gyi rgyud snga ma dang 'dra ba las/ lha'i dbang
200a4(mdo sde): po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ khyod kyis bdag gi slob ma byas pas ci la phan/ nga khyod la gnod pa zhig zer gyi/ gal te gnod pa de khyod kyis byed phod na ni/
200a5(mdo sde): de'i 'og tu tshigs su bcad pa de ngas khyod la brjod par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ grogs po/ tshigs su bcad pa de je rjod cig dang / khyod kyis bdag la gnod pa
200a6(mdo sde): ci phyed du bcug pa de dag thams cad bdag gis bgyi'o/ /grogs po/ tshigs su bcad pa tshang bar smros shig /de skad ces smras ma thag tu lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub
200a7(mdo sde): sems dpa'i mdun du tshigs su bcad pa de tshang bar brjod do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin mi ma yin pa'i cha lugs
200b1(mdo sde): c an ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba ba tud nas tshigs su bcad pa de tshang bar mnos te yun ring mo zhig tu kha ton du sbyangs nas khab sor bzhi ba stong shing leb la btsugs pa de lta
200b2(mdo sde): bu shing leb gnyis kyi bar du bdag nyid nyal te 'tshir bar byed do/ /de de na 'dug bzhin du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab ste/ kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba
200b3(mdo sde): 'dis na/ bdag 'jig rten long ba/ 'dren pa med pa/ ston pa med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde
200b4(mdo sde): bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul bya'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur cig ces byas nas tshigs
200b5(mdo sde): su bcad de smras pa/ sbyin pa chen por gyur pa 'di yis ni/ /sring pa dag tu rang byung sangs rgyas shog /sngon gyi rgyal dbang rnams kyis ma bsgral ba'i/ /skye bo phal chen rgal nas bsgral
200b6(mdo sde): bar bgyi/ de nas yang shing leb kyi bar du btsir ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i lus thams cad las khrag 'bab par gyur nas sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /nam mkha' la
200b7(mdo sde): 'khod pa'i lha rnams kyis kyang me tog gi char phab nas legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin no/ /lhag ma rnams ni/ shi bi'i gtam rgyud snga ma bzhin du bden pas bskul nas lus snga mkho
201a1(mdo sde): bzhin du sor chud par gyur pa'i bar du brjod par bya'o/ / //ko'u sham+b+hi zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yul ko'u
201a2(mdo sde): sham+b+hi na khyim bdag gdangs can gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe ko'u sham+b+hi'i dge slong ma rungs pa/ mthu rtsal che ba/ mdo sde 'dzin pa/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ ma mo
201a3(mdo sde): 'dzin pa/ rtsa 'jing che ba/ g.yog 'khor mang ba zhig gnas te/ de'i dge slong grogs po mang po gzhan dag kyang yod la/ de dag kyang ma rungs pa/ mthu rtsal che ba/ mdo sde
201a4(mdo sde): 'dzin pa/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ ma mo 'dzin pa/ rtsa 'jing che ba/ g.yog 'khor mang ba sha stag go /yul yangs pa can gyi dge slong zhig gis kyang yul ko'u sham+b+hir 'ongs
201a5(mdo sde): te| de yang ma rungs pa/ mthu rtsal che ba/ mdo sde 'dzin pa/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa/ ma mo 'dzin pa/ rtsa 'jing che ba/ g.yog 'khor mang ba zhig yin la/ de'i dge slong
