355a5(mdo sde): yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe dge slong dag dbyar so sor tshul du zhugs nas tshul nas byung ba dang / bcom
355a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das gang na ba der lhags so/ /bcom ldan 'das dge slong dag dang yun ring du ma phrad pas de dag la thugs rtse bar dgongs te/ 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan
355a7(mdo sde): pa'i phyag bteg ste dge slong de dag la bsti stang dang bcas pas khyed na bar ma gyur tam/ bsod snyoms kyis brel tam zhes bka' stsal pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
355b1(mdo sde): pa yon tan chen po dang ldan pa de/ dge slong rnams la bsti stang mdzad par dge slong kun dga' bos mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
355b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ni/ 'jig rten gyi gtso bo/ /yon tan dpag tu ma mchis pa/ ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa lags na/ ci'i slad du thugs smad de dge slong rnams la bsti stang
355b3(mdo sde): mdzad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sngon bskal pa grangs med tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'das pa na 'dzam
355b4(mdo sde): bu'i gling 'dir yul wA ra NA si na khyim bdag so tshis la mkhas pa zhig yod de/ nor ci rnyed kyang gser du bsgyur nas gser gyi bum pa gcig byas te sa 'og tu sbas so/ /de bzhin
355b5(mdo sde): du nor rdzas ci rnyed kyang lus la mi spyod de/ gser du bsgyur nas phyis ring zhig lon pa dang / gser gyi bum pa snga phyir bsags pa bdun du gyur nas thams cad sa 'og tu sbas so/ /
355b6(mdo sde): khyim bdag de phyis nad kyis btab nas tshe dus byas pa dang / gser gyi bum pa la chags pas sbrul gdug pa zhig tu skyes te gser de la srung ngo / /phyis yun ring zhig lon pa dang / grong
355b7(mdo sde): khyer de yang zhig nas su yang mi gnas te/ sa stong du gyur to/ /sbrul de yang lo grangs mang du lon pas tshe'i dus byas nas phyir yang de nyid kyi lus su skyes te gser gyi bum pa la 'khri
356a1(mdo sde): zhing nyal lo/ /de bzhin du lo khri phrag du ma lon pa dang / nang gi skye ba tha ma la lus des skyo ste 'di snyam du bsams so/ /bdag ni/ gser 'di la chags
356a2(mdo sde): pas 'di 'dra ba'i lus la mi sdug pa myong bar gyur gyi/ da ni/ bsod nams kyi zhing la phul nas lam dang nye bar song ste rtswa khrod du lus spas la mi dag 'ongs nas 'bod do snyam ste/
356a3(mdo sde): de'i tshe sbrul gdug pa des mi gcig lam nas 'ong ba mthong nas sbrul gyis mi de la bos pa dang / mi des bos pa'i dgra thos nas phan tshun bltas na cang mi snang bas lam du zhugs
356a4(mdo sde): te song song ba las/ sbrul gyis yang bos te/ kye kho bo'i drung du snyen cig ces smras so/ /mi des smras pa/ khyod kyis kho bo bos te ci zhig bya/ khyod ni/ shin tu gdug pa can yin
356a5(mdo sde): pas| kho bo gsad du 'ong ngo / /sbrul gyis smras pa/ kho bos gnod pa bya na/ khyod drung du ma 'ongs kyang gnod pa bya nus so/ /zhes smras pa dang / mi de skrag nas sprul gyi drung du
356a6(mdo sde): bsnyen to/ /sbrul gyis smras pa/ kho bo la 'di na gser gyi bum pa zhig yod kyi/ khyod la bsod nams shig bya bar bcol na nus sam/ ci ste ma byas na khyod la gnod pa bya'o/ /
356a7(mdo sde): mi des kho bos nus so/ /zhes smras pa dang / sbrul gyis mi de gser gyi bum pa'i drung du khrid de/ gser gyi bum pa gcig bskur te 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyod gser 'di
356b1(mdo sde): khyer la dge 'dun rnams la mchod ston zhig gsol cig / mchod ston gsol ba'i nyin par kho bos kyang 'ong gi /bsus shig ces bsgo'o/ /de nas mi de gser khur du khyer te
356b2(mdo sde): dge 'dun gyi gnas su song nas dge slong gi gtsang sbyor la gser phul te/ 'di ni/ sbrul gdug pa zhig gi gser lags kyi/ gser 'dis dge 'dun la mchod ston gsol cig
356b3(mdo sde): ces mchi'o/ /gser 'dis mchod ston sbyar te mchod ston nam gsol bzhag dus brtsis nas de'i nyin par mi de gzeb cig thogs te sbrul gdug pa de gang na 'dug pa der song ngo / /
356b4(mdo sde): sbrul gdug pa des kyang mi de 'ong ba mthong nas rab tu dga' bar gyur te mi des sbrul gzeb kyi nang du bcug nas khyer te song ba las/ lam du mi zhig dang phrad de/ mi des khyod gang
356b5(mdo sde): nas 'ongs zhes lan gsum gyi bar du dris kyang sbrul thogs pa des cang ma smras pas/ sbrul de khros nas gdug pa byung ba las yang 'di snyam du bsams so/ /mi 'di ci zhig nyes
356b6(mdo sde): na pha rol pos lan gsum gyi bar du dris na/ gtam gyi lan yang mi ster snyam ste phyir yang khros nas gdug pa phyung ba las phyir bkag ste yang 'di snyam du bsams so/ /mi 'di
356b7(mdo sde): bdag gi phyir bsod nams byed na/ byas pa gzo ba'i drin yang dran par byas pas gdug pa mi dbyung ngo snyam bsams te mi 'di bdag la phan pha'i don byed kyi/ nyes pa zhig byas
357a1(mdo sde): na yang bzod par bya'o/ /zhes dben par phyin pa dang / re zhig sa la zhog cig ces smras nas mi des sbrul de la sems smad de bdag gi nyes pa
357a2(mdo sde): 'gyod cing bshags so/ /zhes smras nas phyir yang khur du khyer te dge 'dun gyi gnas su phyin pa dang / dge 'dun dag kyang gdugs tshod kyi dus la bab pas/ mi des dge
357a3(mdo sde): 'dun la me tog brims te sbrul de dad pa'i sems kyis me tog 'brim pa la blta'o/ /de nas dge 'dun dag zas kyi bya ba byas nas kha lag bkrus te sbrul de la chos bshad
357a4(mdo sde): do| |sbrul de rab tu dga' nas gser gyi bum pa drug kyang dge 'dun la phul te bsod nams kyi las byas nas de nas tshe 'phos so/ /tshe'i dus byas nas de'i bsod nams kyis
357a5(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skyes so/ /kun dga' bo/ de'i tshe na sbrul gdug pa khur du khyer ba'i mi de ni/ da ltar nga yin no/ /sbrul gdug pa de ni/ shA ri'i bu yin no/ /'das pa'i
357a6(mdo sde): dus na yang khur du sbrul khyer ba las sbrul gyis spyos te/ de la yang sems smad pas da yang dge slong rnams la sems smad pa yin no/ /kun dga' bo la sogs pa sangs rgyas
357a7(mdo sde): kyis gsungs pa la yi rang nas mngon par dga'o/ /gser gyi bum pa'i le'u ste nyi shu brgyad pa'o// //bram ze mo bde ba'i le'u/ 'di skad bdag gi
357b1(mdo sde): gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya ka lan+da ka gnas pa 'od ma'i tshal na dge slong grangs med pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe yul de na bram
357b2(mdo sde): ze shin tu dbul zhing phongs pa/ ci yang mi bdog pa zhig yod de|bram ze de phongs ches nas kun la ji ltar byas na/ tshe 'di nyid la longs spyod dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /zhes dris
357b3(mdo sde): so| |de la mi zhig gis smras pa/ ci khyod mi shes sam/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba da ltar 'jig rten du gshegs te sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don mdzad
357b4(mdo sde): do| |de'i nye gnas 'od srung chen po dang / mau gal ya na dang / shA ri'i bu dang / ma 'gags pa la sogs pa 'phags pa bzhi yang rtag tu dbul phongs pa la phan pa'i don byed kyi/ gal
357b5(mdo sde): te khyod dad pa'i sems kyis 'phags pa de dag la zhal zas kyis mchod na/ 'phags pa de dag gis/ tshe 'di nyid la khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa de dang de dag dang ldan par mdzad do//
357b6(mdo sde): zhes smras so/ /de'i tshe na bram ze des mi des smras pa thos nas rab tu dga' ste kun tu rgyu zhing slong mo dang gla zos nas nor cung zad cig rnyed de/ phyir khyim du 'ongs nas zhal
357b7(mdo sde): zas sbyar te 'phags pa rnams spyan drangs nas bshos gsol te/ 'jig rten 'di nyid la phan par re'o/ /de'i tshe bram ze de'i chung ma bde ba zhes bya ba des dge 'dun la
358a1(mdo sde): bshos gsol nas nyin zhag gcig pa'i bslab tshigs mnos so/ /de'i tshe rgyal po gsal rgyal 'chag tu song ba las phyir 'ongs pa'i lam du
358a2(mdo sde): nyes pa byas pa'i btson zhig lam ga na shing la bcings shing 'dug pa mthong ngo / /btson des rgyal po gshegs pa mthong nas dus te kha zas shig bslangs pa dang / rgyal
358a3(mdo sde): pos kyang sbyin no/ /zhes byas nas phyir pho brang du gshegs pa dang brjed pa las de'i nub mo nam phyed tsam na btson la kha zas sbyin par byas pa dran te kha zas bskyal
358a4(mdo sde): bar byas nas pho brang nang gi mi ni/ gcig kyang 'gro phod pa med de/ nam phyed na kha zas bskur du lam na 'dre gdon dang / srin pos 'jigs pas srog dang bsdos te
358a5(mdo sde): 'gro nus pa med do/ /de'i tshe rgyal po mi de'i sdug bsngal ba dang / bkres pas nyen pa dran nas de la shin tu snying brtse ste nga'i yul 'di nas su zhig btson de la kha zas skyel
358a6(mdo sde): nus na| gser srang stong sbyin no/ /zhes bsgrags kyang 'gro nus pa ma byung ngo / /de'i tshe bram ze'i chung ma bde ba des gtam du thos na 'jig rten pa su yang rung sta nyin zhag
358a7(mdo sde): gcig pa'i bslab tshigs brgyad mnos na/ 'dre gdon la sogs pas mi brdzi ste/ gdon thams cad kyis gnod pa byed mi nus so/ /zhes thos kyi/ bdag ni/ rgyal
358b1(mdo sde): pos gar btang bar 'gro'o snyam bsams nas chas so/ /de nas rgyal pos bde ba la khyod kha zas 'di dag khyer la che ge mo zhig na btson 'dug pa de la byin cig dang / gser
358b2(mdo sde): srang stong sbyin no/ /zhes dam bcas so/ /de nas bde ba rgyal po'i bka' bzhin du kha zas thogs te tshul khrims dran par byas nas lam du zhugs te song song ba las/ grong khyer
358b3(mdo sde): gyi phyi rol tu srin mo lam pa dang phrad do/ /de'i tshe srin mo de bu lnga brgya gsar du btsas pas bkres skom gyis nyen te bde ba 'ongs par mthong nas bza' bar gzas so/ /de'i tshe bsnyen
358b4(mdo sde): gnas ma tshul khrims ma nyams pas srin mos mthong nas phyir skrag ste/ bsnyen gnas ma khyod khyer ba'i kha zas las cung zad cig bslang ngo / /zhes smras pa dang / bsnyen gnas
358b5(mdo sde): mas kyang nyung du zhig byin te byin pa nyung mod kyi/ srin mo'i mthus mang du sprul pas srin mo ma smad shin tu 'grangs par gyur to/ /de nas srin mos bsnyen gnas ma la khyod kyi ming
358b6(mdo sde): ci zhes dris pa dang / kho mo ni/ bde ba'o/ /zhes smras so/ /'o na kho mo ma smad kyang ltogs pa las khyod kyis gsos kyi/ kho mo 'dug pa 'di na gser bum pa gang yod kyi phyir
358b7(mdo sde): log pa'i lam du khyer cig / khyod phar 'gro na kho mo'i nu mo a lam pa yang lam ga na 'dug ste khyod dang phrad kyi/ kho mo'i 'phrin du khyod bde'am/ kho mo yang bu lnga brgya bde bar
359a1(mdo sde): btsas so/ /zhes gyis shig /de nas bsnyen gnas ma lam du zhugs te song song ba las ring po ma lon par a lam+pa dang phrad do/ /a lam+pa la bu
359a2(mdo sde): mo'i 'phrin spring pa dang / bu lnga brgya bde bar btsas so/ /zhes gtam byas pas a lam+pa dga' ste/ bsnyen gnas ma la khyod kyis kho mo'i phu mo'i 'phrin dang gtam snyan byas
359a3(mdo sde): pa legs kyi/ kho mo 'dug pa'i gnas 'di na gser bum pa gang yod kyi phyir log pa'i las du khyer cig /kho mo cag gi ming po gcig kyang lam ga na 'dug gi /de dang phrad na
359a4(mdo sde): kho mo cag spun gnyis kyi 'phrin dang / bu lnga brgya btsas pa'i gtam yang gyis shig ces bsgo nas song ngo / /de nas yang ring por ma phyin par srin mo gnyis kyi ming po dang
359a5(mdo sde): phrad de| de la srin mo gnyis kyi 'phrin dang bu lnga brgya yang bde bar btsas pa'i gtam byas nas de yang rab tu dga' ste/ khyod kyis kho bo'i sring mo gnyis kyi 'phrin byas pa legs
359a6(mdo sde): kyi| kho bo 'dug pa'i gnas 'di na gser bum pa gang yod kyi/ phyir ldog pa'i lam du khyer cig ces bsgo'o/ /de nas bsnyen gnas ma chas te song song ba las btson
359a7(mdo sde): de'i drung du phyin te kha zas bsnyod nas phyir ldog pa'i lam du gser bum pa gsum yang rnyed do/ /rgyal pos kyang gser srang stong bya dgar byin pas/ bram ze dbul po
359b1(mdo sde): khyo shug gnyis yul de na shin tu phyug cing nor mang bar gyur pas lhag par bsod nams byed cing rin po che mang bar gyur to/ /rgyal pos kyang de bsod nams las gyur par shes
359b2(mdo sde): nas blon por bcug ste shin tu phyug par gyur pas/ lhag par bsod nams byed pa la dad pa'i sems skyes te sangs rgyas dang / dge 'dun spyan drangs nas mchod pa chen po byas
359b3(mdo sde): so| |de la bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pas sems rnam par grol te rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /'khor mang po dang / kun dga' bo la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyis
359b4(mdo sde): gsungs pa la rjes su yi rang nas mngon par dga'o/ /bram ze mo bde ba'i le'u ste nyi shu dgu pa'o// //bam po brgyad pa/ sbyin pa chen po rgya mtshor zhugs
359b5(mdo sde): pa'i le'u/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong chen po'i dge 'dun brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum dang
359b6(mdo sde): thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kauN+Di n+ya la sogs pa la bsnyen bkur byed pa'i g.yog cig dgos so/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang /
359b7(mdo sde): de nas kun shes kauN+Di n+ya stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs su thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la bdag
360a1(mdo sde): gis bsnyen bkur yid bzhin du bgyi zhing chos gos dang lhung bzed gzung ngo / /zhes gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis kauN+Di n+ya la khyod kyang rgas
360a2(mdo sde): 'khogs te khyod nyid la yang bsnyen bkur byed pa dgos kyi/ kauN+Di n+ya khyod stan la 'dug cig ces bka' stsal to/ /de bzhin du 'od srung dang / shA ri'i bu dang / mau gal yan
360a3(mdo sde): la sogs pa nye gnas lnga brgya snyed kun gyis bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bgyi'o/ /zhes gsol na yang gcig kyang ma gnang ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas/
360a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bsnyen bkur byed pa'i dge slong gang la dgyes snyam du brtags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kun dga' bo la dgyes pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ khang bu brtsegs
360a5(mdo sde): pa'i shar phyogs kyi skar khung nas nyi ma'i 'od zer byung ba na nub phyogs kyi ngos la shar cing lhan pa bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kun dga' bo la dgongs shing
360a6(mdo sde): dgyes par nye gnas kun gyis rtogs nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / mau gal gyi bu chen po gnyis kun dga' bo gang na ba der song ste drung du phyin pa dang kun dga' bo dang
360a7(mdo sde): lhan cig tu yid mgu zhing dga' ba'i gtam rnam ba dum byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas shA ri'i bu dang / mau gal ya nas tshe dang ldan pa
360b1(mdo sde): kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo/ bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bya bar dad dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyang khyod kyis bsnyen bkur bya
360b2(mdo sde): bar dgyes te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur byas na/ khyod la phan pa'i don cher 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ bdag ni/ bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bya
360b3(mdo sde): bar mi dad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni/ sgrub par dka'/ bzod par dka'o/ /'di lta ste/ me 'bar ba ni/ sgrub par dka'/ bzod par yang dka'
360b4(mdo sde): ba yin te/ de ltar de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyang sgrub par dka'/ bzod par dka' bas na/ bdag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bgyid par
360b5(mdo sde): mi dad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa mau gal ya na'i bu chen pos kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kun dga' bo/ khyod la bcom ldan 'das dgongs shing dgyes pa ni/ 'di
360b6(mdo sde): lta ste| khang bu brtsegs pa'i shar phyogs kyi skar khung nas nyi ma'i 'od zer byung ba na nub phyogs kyi rtsig ngos la shar cing lhan pa bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyang kun
360b7(mdo sde): dga' bo khyod kyis bsnyen bkur bya bar dgyes kyi/ dad par gyis shig /de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur byas na/ khyod la phan pa'i don cher 'gyur ro/ /zhes smras
361a1(mdo sde): so| |btsun pa mau gal yan chen po/ /ci ste bdag la bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa 'di gsum gnang na/ bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur
361a2(mdo sde): bgyid par dad do/ /'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das mi gsol ba'i na bza' bdag la 'tshal du mi stsal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das mi gsol ba'i bshos kyi lhag ma bdag
361a3(mdo sde): mi 'tshal ba dang / bdag dus ma mchis par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchir gnang bar bgyi na ni/ bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bgyi bar dad do/ /de nas tshe
361a4(mdo sde): dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / mau gal yan chen pos tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bsnyen bkur byed du dad par byas nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa
361a5(mdo sde): dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bgyid par tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dad par bgyis na/
361a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la 'dod pa 'di gsum gnang na/ gdod bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bgyi bar zhes mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
361a7(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ legs so/ /mau gal ya na'i bu/ dge slong kun dga' bo de ni/ mkhas pa shes rab can te/ tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams smad pa'i tshig dang /rjes
361b1(mdo sde): su smad pa'i tshig gi chos phyis 'byung bar mthong bas na/ bdag la tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams 'di skad du dge slong kun dga' bo ni/ gos dang zas kyi phyir ston
361b2(mdo sde): pa la bsnyen bkur byed do/ /zhes smra bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir mau gal gyi bu de ni/ dge slong kun dga' bo'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos so/ /dge slong kun dga' bo ni/ mkhas
361b3(mdo sde): pa shes rab can te/ dus shes shing dus rig pa lags shing / dus shes par 'gyur ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das la 'khor rnam bzhi blta bar 'gro ba'i dus la bab pa dang /
361b4(mdo sde): dus la ma bab pa dang / gzhan yang mu stegs can kun tu rgyu rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'gro ba'i dus la bab pa dang / dus la ma bab pa dang / gzhan yang mu stegs
361b5(mdo sde): can kun tu rgyu 'di dag ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la lan ldon par spobs so/ /'di dag ni/ lan ldon par mi spobs so/ /bca' ba dang bza' ba 'di ni bcom
361b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das la bde zhing bsod par 'gyur la/ 'di ni/ bde zhing bsod par mi 'gyur bar shes pa'i phyir te/ mau gal gyi bu/ 'di ni/ dge slong kun dga' bo'i ngo mtshar rmad
361b7(mdo sde): du byung ba'i chos so/ /de nas shA ri'i bu dang / mau gal gyi bu gnyis kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byed par dad par byas pa dang / bcom
362a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis kyang kun dga' bo ni/ mkhas pa shes rab can te/ dus shes shing dus rig go /zhes bsngags pas/ dge slong rnams the tshom skyes
362a2(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge slong kun dga' bo 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis dus dang tshod la mkhas par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis shA ri'i bu
362a3(mdo sde): la bka' stsal pa/ sngon 'das pa'i bskal pa tshad med grangs med pa'i pha rol tu rgyal po chen po 'dzam bu'i gling gi rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong la dbang byed pa zhig byung ngo / /
362a4(mdo sde): de'i tshe grong khyer pa ru da zhes bya ba na bram ze n+ya gro d+ha zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ mkhas pa/ rig pa dang ldan pa/ sman dang / gtsug lag dang / skar ma la mkhas pa zhig pas
362a5(mdo sde): rgyal po de'i ston pa byed de/ rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong snyed kyang de la rgyal po chen po dang 'dra bar bsnyen bkur byed de bsgo ba'i tshig kyang nyon to/ /bram ze de phyug khyad rnam
362a6(mdo sde): thos kyi bu dang 'gran te/ de la bu med bas rtag tu mi dga' ste sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa las ji ltar byas na bu yod par 'gyur zhes tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang /
362a7(mdo sde): dbang phyug dang / nyi zla dang / skar ma dang / ri dang / chu dang / nags kyi lha kun la mchod cing rjed de lo bcu gnyis lon nas chung ma chen sems can dang ldan par gyur
362b1(mdo sde): to| |bud med mkhas pa dag ni/ sems can dang ldan ma thag tu bu khye'u 'am/ bu mo yin pa nges par rtogs pas/ de yang khye'u yin par shes nas bram ze la gtam smras so/ /bram
362b2(mdo sde): ze de de skad ces smras pa thos nas rab tu dga' mgu rangs te chung ma'i rim gro lhag par cher skyed do/ /de nas zla ba dgu tshang nas khye'u zhig btsas te gser gyi mdog can/ skra
362b3(mdo sde): mthon mthing du 'dug pa/ bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ mtshan dang ldan pa zhig go /de nas btsas ston byas nas mtshan mkhan bkug ste mtshan bltas nas ming sbyin pa chen po zhes
362b4(mdo sde): btags so/ /khye'u de rim gyis cher skyes nas dbyar dgun dang / ston dpyid kyi gnas kyang so sor byas te longs spyod byed du bcug go /khye'u de yang yid gzhungs shing mkhas
362b5(mdo sde): pa'i blo dang ldan pa zhig bas rig byed dang / gtsug lag rnam pa bco brgyad la sogs te/ sgyu rtsal gang yang mi shes pa med do/ /phyis sbyin pa chen pos pha ma la gsol pa/
362b6(mdo sde): bdag phyi rol tu 'chag cing ltad mo bltar 'gro'o/ /zhes byas pa dang / de'i pha mas kyang bu 'chag tu 'gro'o/ /zhes lam srang phyag dar byed du bcug ste rgyal mtshan dang / ba
362b7(mdo sde): d an bsgrengs nas me tog gis gtor te bdug spos kyi bdug pa la sogs pa yo lang bshams nas sbyin pa chen po glang po rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa la bskyon te
363a1(mdo sde): dril bsgrags/ rnga brdungs/ rol mo dang / sil snyan bkrol te 'khor brgya stong snyed kyis bskor nas grong khyer gyi phyi rol tu song ngo / /yul mi thams
363a2(mdo sde): cad lam gyi g.yas g.yon du khang bu brtsegs pa'i steng nas mig mi 'dzum par lta zhing 'di'i byin dang / gzi brjid ni/ tshangs pa dang 'dra'o/ /zhes bsgrags so/ /de nas
363a3(mdo sde): song song ba las mu to ba dag gos hrul po gyon cing snod chag pa dag thogs te cung zad bslang ngo / /zhes 'bod pa sbyin pa chen pos thos nas de dag la khyed ci'i phyir 'di
363a4(mdo sde): ltar nyon mongs shing sdug ces dris so/ /de la kha cig ni/ 'di skad du bdag cag la pha ma dang / phu nu dang / bu smad dang / gnyen bshes ma mchis pas sdug go /zhes
363a5(mdo sde): zer ro| |de la kha cig ni/ bdag cag yun ring du nad kyis btab pas mi sos te sdug go /zhes zer ro/ /de la kha cig ni/ bdag cag bag ma byas pas chom pos bcom
363a6(mdo sde): ste ci yang mi bdog pas slong mo byed do/ /zhes zer ro/ /sbyin pa chen pos de skad smras pa thos nas mchi ma dku ste song ngo / /de nas yang pha zad cig na bshan pa dag cig
363a7(mdo sde): srog chags bsad nas pags pa ba shu ba dang / bsnyal gtubs pa dag mthong ngo / /sbyin pa chen pos e ma ho 'di dag ci byed ces dris na/ bdag cag ni/ pha mes rgyud
363b1(mdo sde): kyis 'di 'dri ba'i gsod pa'i las byed de/ 'di ma byas na mi 'tsho'o/ /zhes zer ro/ /de la sbyin pa chen po ngo mtshar du gyur nas lta mi 'dod par song ngo / /de nas pha zad du
363b2(mdo sde): phyin pa dang zhing pa dag zhing rmos te/ zhing rmos pa'i shul na srin bu mang du byung ba la bya mang po dang / sbrul dag 'thu zhing za ba mthong ba dang 'di dag ci byed ces dris na/ bdag
363b3(mdo sde): cag ni| zhing rmos te sa glongs pa'i shul du sa bon btab na phyis mang du skyes te/ des 'tsho zhing rgyal po'i dpya yang 'bul lo/ /zhes zer ro/ /sbyin pa chen po de la yang ngo
363b4(mdo sde): mtshar du gyur nas pha zad song ba dang / rngon pa dag bya rgya bres pa dang / rnyi btsugs nas bya rnams bshor ba dang / sems can dag bya rgya dang rnyis zin nas lus rdeb cing
363b5(mdo sde): 'then kyang ma shor te snying rje ba'i skad phyung nas shin tu 'jigs skrag pa dag mthong nas khyed ci byed ces dris na/ bdag cag kyang rgyud kyis 'di 'dra ba'i gsod pa'i las
363b6(mdo sde): byed pas 'tsho'o/ /zhes zer ro/ /sbyin pa chen pos de skad smras pa thos nas shin tu yi mug ste yang pha zad song ba dang / nya sa dag nya rgyas nya bcus nas mang du zin te thang la
363b7(mdo sde): phung por spungs nas da dung yang 'gul ba dag mthong nas 'di dag ci byed ces dris na/ bdag cag rgyud kyis las gzhan mi byed kyi/ 'di ltar nya bshor zhing 'tsho bar byed do//
364a1(mdo sde): zhes zer ro/ /sbyin pa chen pos 'di lta bu dag mthong nas 'di snyam du bsams so/ /sems can 'di dag ni/ dbul phongs pas bgo ba
364a2(mdo sde): dang bza' ba'i phyir 'di lta bu'i kha na ma tho ba'i las gsod pa la sogs pa byed de/ 'di dag ni/ tshe 'phos ma thag tu ngan song gsum du lhung ste mun pa nas mun par
364a3(mdo sde): ' gro zhing thar pa'i dus med do snyam bsams nas phyir khyim du 'ongs te nyin mtshan du de sems shing mi dga' nas pha'i drung du song ste pha la bdag gsol ba zhig mchis
364a4(mdo sde): kyi| gnong zhig ces smras so/ /phas kyang bu/ khyod ci zer/ khyod smra ba bzhin du bya'o/ /zhes smras so/ /yab/ bdag sngon phyi rol tu 'chag tu mchis pa las mi mang po gos
364a5(mdo sde): dang / kha zas kyi phyir thams cad nyon mongs te/ gcig la gcig gsod pa dang / rdzun dang / dbang za ba dang / mi dge ba'i las rnam pa sna tshogs bgyid pa mthong nas
364a6(mdo sde): de dag la sbyin pa bgyid par bsams kyi/ yab kyi bang mdzod chen po las phongs brel pa dag gi phyir yid bzhin du spyod du gnod zhig /phas smras pa/ ngas bang mdzod
364a7(mdo sde): dang / rin po che mang du bsags pa thams cad khyod kyi phyir byas par zad na/ ci'i phyir khyod zer ba mi nyan zhes smras so/ /de nas sbyin pa chen pos phas gnang ba'i lung
364b1(mdo sde): thob nas yul mi thams cad la sbyin pa chen po sbyin gtong chen po byed kyi/ thams cad 'dus shing shog cig ces bsgrags so/ /de'i tshe dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / dbul zhing
364b2(mdo sde): phongs pa mgon med pa dang / nad pa la sogs te grong khyer gyi phyi rol na lam thog thag tu gang ngo / /de dag kyang dpag tshad brgya dang / nyis brgya dang / sum brgya dang / bzhi brgya
364b3(mdo sde): dang / lnga brgya dang / dpag tshad stong gi lam nas 'ongs/ kha cig ni/ dpag tshad nyis stong dang / sum stong dang / bzhi stong dang / lnga stong nas dpag tshad khri'i bar du lhags te/
364b4(mdo sde): de dag sprin bzhin du 'dus nas thams cad la yid bzhin du sbyin pa ni/ gos 'dod pa la gos/ zas 'dod pa la zas/ rin po che gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+ya dang / mu sa
364b5(mdo sde): ra gal pa dang / bzhon pa dang / theg pa dang / khyogs dang / skyed mos tshal dang / zhing dang / rkang 'gro la sogs te/ yid bzhin du sbyin pa byas so/ /de ltar sbyin pa la zhugs
364b6(mdo sde): te yun ring zhig lon pa dang / bang mdzod sum cha gcig zad nas mdzod srung gis bram ze la 'di skad ces smras so/ /sras kyis bang mdzod nas sbyin pa byas nas sum cha gcig ni/
364b7(mdo sde): zad de sum gnyis las ma lus na/ phan tshun du 'drul ba'i skyes dang / tshong zong ci las bgyid dgongs shig ces smras so/ /kho bo ni/ bu 'di la byams pas ngo mi ldog gi/
365a1(mdo sde): bang mdzod stongs kyang bla'o/ /zhes bsgo'o/ /de nas yang ring zhig lo na pa dang bang mdzod sum gnyis zad de sum cha tsam lus pa dang / mdzod
365a2(mdo sde): srung gis yang bram ze la/ da ni/ bang mdzod sum gnyis tsam zad de sum cha tsam las ma lus na/ phan tshun skyes bskur ba dang / tshong zong ci las bya zhes smras so/ /bram
365a3(mdo sde): ze des bsgo ba/ kho bo'i bu sdug ches te ngo mi ldog pas smra mi phod kyi/ khyod bdag gis thabs ci legs su byos la brel cing mi khom pa ltar tha snyad thogs shig /mdzod srung
365a4(mdo sde): gis bram ze las lung thob nas mdzod sgo bcad de don gnyer du song ngo / /de nas slong ba dag sbyin pa chen po'i thad du lhags nas bar 'ga' ni/ mdzod srung mi rnyed de
365a5(mdo sde): mdzod sgo mi phyed/ gal te mdzod srung 'ongs na yang yid bzhin du mi ster bas sbyin pa chen pos 'di snyam du bsams so/ /'di ltar gyur pa 'di ni/ mdzod srung gis
365a6(mdo sde): thugs mi thub pas pha'i man ngag 'ongs kyi/ yong yang bus pha'i bang mdzod stongs par bya bar mi rigs kyi/ bdag gis da thabs ci zhig byas na/ rin po che yid bzhin
365a7(mdo sde): du rnyed de skye bo mang po la phan thogs par 'gyur ba bsams nas mi dag la 'di skad ces dris so/ /'jig rten na las ci zhig byas na/ rin po che yid bzhin du rnyed
365b1(mdo sde): de nor dbyig mang du rnyed cing zad mi shes par 'gyur zhes dris pa dang / kha cig ni/ zhing mang du rmos na nor dbyig mang por 'gyur ro/ /zhes zer ro/ kha cig ni/ rkang 'gro spel
365b2(mdo sde): te spogs byas na nor mang du rnyed do/ /zhes zer ro/ kha cig ni/ lam ring por tshong spogs byas na nor mang du rnyed do/ /zhes zer ro/ kha cig ni/ rgya mtshor zhugs te nor bu
365b3(mdo sde): rin po che blangs na rin po che mang du 'gyur ro/ /zhes zer ro/ /sbyin pa chen pos de dag gis smras pa thos nas zhing rmo ba dang / rkang 'gro spel ba dang / lam ring por tshong
365b4(mdo sde): la 'gro ba ni/ nga'i cha ma yin gyi/ rgya mtshor 'jug pa 'ba' zhig nga'i cha'o/ /zhes smras nas rgya mtshor 'jug go snyam bsams te pha ma la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag ni/ rgya
365b5(mdo sde): mtsho nas rin po che mang po blangs te dbul phongs pa la sbyin pa yid bzhin du bgyi'o/ /bdag rgya mtshor rin po che len du mchir gnong zhig ces smras so/ /de'i pha mas de skad
365b6(mdo sde): ces smras pa thos nas 'khams te bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jig rten na dbul 'phongs pa dag ni/ blo med de/ lus dang srog dang bsngos nas 'gro bar byed do/ /khyod cis
365b7(mdo sde): phongs nas de lta bur sems/ khyod sbyin pa byed 'dod na/ khyim na yod pa'i nor thams cad sbyin par byos shig /rgya mtshor ni/ 'gror mi rung ste/ rgya mtsho'i nang na chu rlabs
366a1(mdo sde): dang / dba' klong 'khyil ba dang / chu srin dang / klu gdug pa dang / srin mo dang / ri chu'i mdog can la sogs te shin tu yang ba'i bgegs
366a2(mdo sde): mang du yod pas thar par dka' na/ khyod cis phongs nas srog dang bsngo bar byed/ 'di la ni/ nyan pa med kyi/ ma sems par 'dug cig ces bsgo'o/ /sbyin pa chen pos de skad
366a3(mdo sde): ces bsgo ba thos nas bsam pa bzhin du ma grub pas yi dam bcas te/ bsam pa 'di ma grub kyi bar du pha ma'i mdun du sa la khas bub tu nyal te mi ldang ngo snyam bsams
366a4(mdo sde): nas yab yum gyis mkhyen par mdzod cig / bdag ni/ bsam pa bzhin du ma grub kyi bar du khas bub tu nyal ba 'di las mi ldang ngo / /zhes smras so/ /de nas pha ma mi dga' ste
366a5(mdo sde): gnyen bshes dang bgros nas rgya mtsho'i nang du bgegs yang ba mang du yod pa'i gtam yang byas/ bdag kyang rmongs pa las lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du lha kun la mchod de
366a6(mdo sde): khyod lta zhig nga'i bur skyes na/ nged ma dor bar zan zo zhig ces zhag gcig zhag gnyis nas zhag drug gi bar du tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gros btab kyang ma nyan te/ sngar
366a7(mdo sde): ji skad da smras pa las ma ldog go / pha ma skrag nas yang 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag gi bu 'di thog ma nas da tsam gyi bar du bya ba brtsams pa mthar ma grub kyi bar du mi
366b1(mdo sde): gtong bas/ rgya mtshor btang na brgya la phyir ldog kyang srid kyi/ ma btang na zhag bdun lon na 'phral du bye brag 'bye ste/ da ni/ gtang dgos so snyam bgros nas bu'i drung du song ste lag
366b2(mdo sde): pa nas bzung nas bu longs la zan zo zhig / yid bzhin du 'gro bar gnang ngo / /zhes smras pa dang / sbyin pa chen po yang langs te bza' ba zos/ btang ba 'thungs so/ /de nas phyi
366b3(mdo sde): rol tu byung ste mi mang po la kho bo rgya mtshor rin po che len du 'gro'o/ /khyed su 'gror dga' ba rnams dang 'grogs te 'dong gi/ de dad pon yang kho bos bya la yo byed kyang kho bos sbyar
366b4(mdo sde): ro| |zhes bsgrags so/ /de'i tshe mi lnga brgya tsam yang 'gro bar khas blangs nas so so nas yo byad sbyar te nam 'gro ba'i dus kyang byas nas dus bzhin du lam du zhugs te chos so/ /
366b5(mdo sde): lam du 'jug pa'i tshe khye'u'i pha ma dang / rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang / blon po la sogs te yul mi thams cad kyis kyang bskyal nas rdzongs bstabs so/ /pha mas kyang ngus te phyi phyag byas
366b6(mdo sde): nas zhag du ma'i lam 'das pa dang / 'brog stong du phyin te nub mo dgong ma la du mi rgod kyis bcom nas nor rdzas kun 'phrog go /de nas song song ba la grong khyer shu pa ra zhes
366b7(mdo sde): bya bar phyin nas grong khyer de na bram ze ka pi li zhes bya ba dang phrad de/ bram ze de'i khyim du song nas bram ze de las sbyin pa chen pos gser srang sum stong bslang bar byas so/ /
367a1(mdo sde): de'i tshe na bram ze de la bu mo gser gyi mdog can/ skra mthon mthing khar 'dug pa/ rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong snyed kyi rgyal bu thams cad kyis
367a2(mdo sde): bslangs na yang ma ster ba zhig yod de/ de'i tshe na sbyin pa chen po bram ze de'i sgor song ste bram ze ka pi li 'dug gam zhes dris pa'i tshe bu mos khyim gyi nang nas sbyin pa chen po'i
367a3(mdo sde): skad thos pa tsam gyis sgo phyi na skad grag pa 'di kho mo'i khyim thab yin no/ /zhes pha ma la smras so/ /de nas bram ze sgor byung nas phrad pa dang / khye'u de la 'di ni/ nges par gzhan
367a4(mdo sde): bas 'phags so snyam bsams so/ /khye'u des gser bslangs pa dang / bram zes kyang sbyin par gnang nas lag pa ya gcig tu ni/ gser thogs/ lag pa ya gcig gis bu mo
367a5(mdo sde): khrid de| bu mo 'di yang khyod kyi chung mar sbyin gyi/ longs shig ces smras pa dang / sbyin pa chen pos smras pa/ bdag ni/ rgya mtsho chen por rin po che len du 'gro ste/ rgya
367a6(mdo sde): mtsho'i nang na bgegs shin tu mang bas kho bo 'khor tam mi 'khor gyi gtol med de/ khyod kyi bu mo chung mar len pa'i thugs mi thub bo/ /bram zes smras pa/ khyod bde
367a7(mdo sde): bar 'khor na bu mo 'di chung mar longs shig ces smras pa dang / sbyin pa chen pos kyang phyir 'khor na de bzhin du bya'o/ /zhes smras so/ /de nas bram zes kyang gser srang sum
367b1(mdo sde): stong dang / gzhan yang yo byad ci dgos pa kun sbyar te/ de nas chas pas rgya mtsho'i ngogs su phyin to/ /de nas gru bcos te gru'i nang du zhugs nas de nas thag pa bdun gyis
367b2(mdo sde): brtod de gru'i nang nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgya mtsho'i nang na bgegs 'di dag yod de/ 'di lta ste/ rlung nag po dang / srin po dang / chu'i dba' rlabs 'khyil pa dang / klu
367b3(mdo sde): gdug pa dang / chu'i mdog lta bu'i ri dang / chu srin la sogs pa'i bgegs yang ba mang du yod kyi/ khyed las 'gror mi dad pa zhig yod na 'di las phyir log cig/ /phyis
367b4(mdo sde): 'gyod par gyur ta re/ gal te lus dang srog la mi lta ste/ pha ma dang / phu nu dang / bu dang / chung ma dang / gnyen bshes la mi chags na 'dong ngo / /gal te bde bar phyin na/
367b5(mdo sde): rin po che sna bdun gyis bu tsha rabs bdun tshun chad phyug par 'gyur te/ longs spyod zad mi shes par 'gyur ro/ /zhes smras nas thag pa gcig bcad do/ /de bzhin du nyi
367b6(mdo sde): ma bdun gyi bar du nyin re lan re de skad sgras nas rtod thag re re bcad de rlung dang sbyar te g.yor shing bsgreng bas mgyogs khyod mda' bzhin song ngo / /de nas tshong ba dag
367b7(mdo sde): dang rin po che'i gling du phyin nas sbyin pa chen po mang du thos pas rin po che brtag pa la yang shin tu mkhas te/ rin po che bzang ngan dang / lci yang dang / ji tsam ri ba'i rin thang
368a1(mdo sde): phan tshun tshong pa rnams la bstan nas rin po che kha ngog 'di lta bu ni/ yang mod kyi/ rin che'o/ /rin po che 'di dag ni/ lci yang rin chung gi /ma
368a2(mdo sde): len cig / ha cang yang mang ches na gru lci bas 'bying ngo / /ha cang nyung ches na yang nyon mongs te song song ba'i don med pas/ 'di tsam zhig ni/ ran no/ /zhes bya ba la sogs
368a3(mdo sde): pa'i tshod kyang bstan nas rin po che grur brdzangs te ci la yang ma rag nas da phyir 'dong ngo / /zhes chas pa dang / sbyin pa chen po gru'i nang du 'ong du ma btub nas tshong pa rnams
368a4(mdo sde): la kho bo ni/ klu'i rgyal po'i pho brang nas yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che ma thob kyi bar du mi ldog go /zhes smras so/ /de nas tshong pa rnams kyis dus te mya ngan gyis yi mug
368a5(mdo sde): nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag cag tshong pa 'di rnams ni/ skyes bu ded dpon khyod kyi g.yog tu 'ongs te/ da khyod kyis 'dir dor to mi 'gro na bdag cag kyang phyir khyim
368a6(mdo sde): du mi phyin te/ thams cad 'khyams par 'gyur ro/ /sbyin pa chen pos smras pa/ tshong pa khyed cag mi nyes par yul du phyin par kho bos kyang smon lam gdab bo/ /zhes bog

368b1(mdo sde): pa'i bsod nams des sangs rgyas su 'grub pa'i phyir ro/ /bdag gis smras pa 'di bden te smon lam bzhin du 'grub na/ tshong pa 'di dag rin po che dang bcas pa nye zhe med par
368b2(mdo sde): 'dzam bu'i gling du bde bar phyin par shog cig ces smon lam btab nas thag pa bcad de g.yor shing bsgrengs nas phyir 'dzam bu'i gling du bde bar dong ngo / /de dag song ba'i
368b3(mdo sde): 'og tu sbyin pa chen po chur zhugs te song ba las zhag bdun gyi bar du ni/ pus mo tsam las ma nub bo/ /de nas yang zhag bdun gyi bar du ni/ brla drung tsam las ma nub
368b4(mdo sde): bo/ |de nas yang zhag bdun song ba las rked pa tsam las ma nub bo/ /zhag bdun lon gyi bar du ni/ phrag pa tsam du phyin to/ /de nas zhag bdun gyi bar du ni/ rkyal lo/ /de nas
368b5(mdo sde): ri zhig gi drung du phyin pa dang shing la 'jus te ri la 'dzegs nas zhag bdun gyis rtse mor phyin to/ /ri rtser zhag bdun song song nas yang zhag bdun gyis shod du chu 'gram du
368b6(mdo sde): phyin to| |chu 'gram du phyin pa dang chu'i nang na pad+ma gser gyi mdog can yod pa la sbrul gdug pas pad+ma'i rtsa ba la dkris shing 'dug pa mthong ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa'
368b7(mdo sde): skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug nas sems rtse gcig tu byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs te/ sbrul gdug pa 'di dag kyang sngon zhe sdang dang / phrag dog byas pa'i rkyen gyis 'di lta
369a1(mdo sde): b u'i lus mi sdug pa myong ngo snyam lhag par de la snying brtse ba'i sems skyes pas sbrul gdug pa de'i gdug pa kun zhi nas byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma
369a2(mdo sde): de'i steng nas gom pa dor te song song ba las zhag bdun gyis sprul gdug pa de dag las brtol to/ /de nas yang song song ba las srin po dang phrad nas srin po de dag mi'i dri tshor
369a3(mdo sde): bas kun tu tshol lo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems rtse gcig tu byams pa'i sems kyis brtags pas srin po de dag 'jam pa'i tshig gis skyes bu khyod gang nas 'ongs/
369a4(mdo sde): gang du 'gro zhes dris so/ /de la sbyin pa chen pos kho bo ni/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che tshol du 'ongs so/ /zhes smras so/ /de nas srin po de dag rab tu dga' ste/ 'di ni/
369a5(mdo sde): bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa zhig snyam bsams nas 'di ni/ da dung klu'i pho brang las shin tu ring ste nam yang mi phyin pas nyon mongs par 'gyur gyi/ mthu zhig bstangs
369a6(mdo sde): te bskyal lo snyam nas nam mkha' la khyer te dpag tshad bzhi brgya'i pha rol tu phyin nas phyir yang sa la bzhag go / sbyin pa chen po de nas yang song song ba las ring po ma lon
369a7(mdo sde): par dngul gyi mkhar zhig mthong nas klu'i gnas yin no snyam bsams te nye bar song ngo / /mkhar de'i phyi rol 'obs rim pa bdun gyis bskor te 'obs kyi nang na sbrul
369b1(mdo sde): gdug pa 'jigs su rung bas gang ngo / /sbyin pa chen pos de dag mthong nas sbrul gdug pa 'di dag ni/ sngon zhe sdang che ba'i lan gyis 'di lta bu'i lus 'jigs su rung ba
369b2(mdo sde): myong bar gyur to snyam ste/ de la bu gcig pa dang 'dra bar byams shing snying rje ba'i sems skyes te/ de ltar byams pa'i sems bskyed pas sprul gyi gdug pa yang zhi bar gyur
369b3(mdo sde): nas sprul de dag brdzis te klu'i mkhar du song ngo / /mkhar de la klu gnyis kyis dkris te klu'i mgo mkhar sgo la bstan to/ /klu de gnyis kyis sbyin pa chen po mthong nas mgo bteg
369b4(mdo sde): ste gdug pa 'byin pa las sbyin pa chen po byams pa'i sems bskyed pas/ gdug pa yang zhi nas mgo smad de nyal lo/ /sbyin pa chen pos klu'i mgo la brdzis nas mkhar gyi
369b5(mdo sde): nang du song ba dang / mkhar gyi nang na klu zhig rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang na 'dug pa mthong ngo / /klu'i rgyal po des byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba dang sdangs te
369b6(mdo sde): 'di snyam du bsams so/ /nga'i gnas 'di 'obs rim pa bdun gyis bskor te 'obs kyi nang na sbrul gdug pas gang bas/ klu dang / gnod sbyin ma yin pa gzhan gang
369b7(mdo sde): yang 'dir 'ong ba'i thugs mi thub na/ 'di lta bu su zhig yin snyam ste 'dug pa las langs nas bsu ste bsti stang dang bcas pas phyag byas nas rin po che'i khri la bzhag ste
370a1(mdo sde): kha zas rnam pa sna tshogs byin no/ /kha zas zos nas khyod 'dir ci la 'ongs/ ji ltar phyin ces dris so/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/
370a2(mdo sde): 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi dag ni/ dbul phongs pas nor dang gos dang zas kyi phyir gcig la gcig rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 'tshe zhing gnod pa byed de/ tshe 'phos ma thag
370a3(mdo sde): tu ngan song gsum du ltung ngo / /bdag ni/ de dag la snying brtse ste de dag gi mgon bya ba'i phyir lam ring po nas nyon mongs pa dang bsngos te rgyal po chen po khyod la nor
370a4(mdo sde): bu rin po che slong du 'ongs so/ /yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po ches sems can la phan gdags pa'i bsod nams kyis mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal gyi/ bdag
370a5(mdo sde): gis yid dang mi 'gal bar rin po che stsal bar gsol/ /klu'i rgyal pos smras pa/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che ni/ shin tu yang rnyed dka' ba yin te/ khyod don
370a6(mdo sde): 'di'i phyir 'ongs na 'dir zla ba gcig cig 'dug ste/ bdag gis mchod pa cung zad bzhes la bdag cag la chos kyang bstan na/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che
370a7(mdo sde): yang sbyin no/ /zhes byas pa dang / byang chub sems dpas kyang de bzhin du bya'o/ /zhes smras so/ /de nas klu'i rgyal pos nyin gcig bzhin du kha zas ro brgya dang
370b1(mdo sde): ldan pa rnam pa sna tshogs sbyar te phul nas rol mos byang chub sems dpa' la mchod do/ /byang chub sems dpas kyang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i chos kyi yan lag
370b2(mdo sde): zla ba gcig gi bar tu bstan nas phyir 'gro'o/ /zhes byas pa dang / klu'i rgyal po dga' nas spyi bo'i gtsug phud las yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che bkrol te phul lo/ /skyes
370b3(mdo sde): bu chen po 'gro ba la phan pa'i don du yi dam la shin tu brtan pa khyod gdon mi za bar 'tshang rgya'o/ /nam mngon par sangs rgyas pa na bdag kyang khyod kyi nye gnas mchog tu
370b4(mdo sde): gyur cig ces smras so/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po la nor bu rin po che 'di la mthu stobs ci yod ces dris na/ smras pa/ nor bu 'di ni/ dpag tshad nyis stong khor khor yug tu
370b5(mdo sde): dgos pa thams cad char bzhin du 'bebs nus so/ /byang chub sems dpas bsam pa/ nor bu rin po che 'di mthu stobs che mod kyi/ 'on kyang bdag gis bsam pa'i don
370b6(mdo sde): chen po sgrub nus pa ma yin no bsams nas klu'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pas bskyal te song ngo / /de nas yang song song ba las rgyang ma nas bai DUR+ya sngon po'i mkhar zhig
370b7(mdo sde): mthong ngo / /mkhar de 'dod pas song ba dang mkhar de'i drung du phyin pa dang / mkhar de yang 'obs rim pa bdun gyis bskor te 'obs kyi nang na sbrul gdug pas yongs su
371a1(mdo sde): gang ngo / /byang chub sems dpas sbrul gdug pa de dag la snying brtse zhing byams pa'i sems bskyed pas sbrul gyi gdug pa zhi nas sbrul de dag la brdzis
371a2(mdo sde): pa song ngo / /mkhar sgor phyin pa dang klu gnyis shig mkhar sgo na nyal ba yang byang chub sems dpa' snying brtse zhing byams pa'i sems kyis klu'i gdug pa zhi nas mgo la
371a3(mdo sde): brdzis te mkhar gyi nang du song ngo / /de'i tshe mkhar de na klu'i rgyal po zhig rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang na 'dug pas rgyang ma nas byang chub sems dpa' mthong nas
371a4(mdo sde): 'di snyam du bdag gi gnas 'di la 'obs rim pa bdun gyis bskor te/ 'obs kyi nang na sbrul gdug pas gang bas klu dang gnod sbyin ma yin pa gzhan su yang 'ong ba'i thugs
371a5(mdo sde): mi thub na/ mi 'di lta bu su yin/ gang nas 'ongs snyam ste ya mtshan du gyur nas bsu ste bsti stang dang bcas pas phyag byas nas rin po che'i gdan la bzhag go /de nas kha
371a6(mdo sde): zas ro brgya dang ldan pa rnam pa sna tshogs sbyar te phul nas byang chub sems dpas kha zas zos pa'i 'og tu khyod 'dir ci las 'ongs/ don ci yod ces dris so/ /byang chub
371a7(mdo sde): sems dpas smras pa/ bdag ni/ rgyal po khyod la yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che slong du 'ongs so/ /klus smras pa/ rin po che ni/ shin tu yang rnyed par dka' ste/
371b1(mdo sde): khyod 'dod pa yang dag na/ kho bos gsol ba bzhin du zla ba gnyis shig 'dir 'dug ste/ bdag cag la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bstan pas bdag cag gi mchod pa bzhes
371b2(mdo sde): na| nor bu rin po che yang sbyin no/ /zhes byas pa dang / sbyin pa chen pos kyang de bzhin du bya'o/ /zhes smras so/ /de nas klu'i rgyal pos zla ba gnyis kyi bar du kha zas ro brgya dang
371b3(mdo sde): l dan pa rnam pa sna tshogs sbyar te phul nas rol mo sna tshogs kyis mchod de byang chub sems dpas kyang de dag la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i chos kyi rnam grangs zla ba gnyis kyi
371b4(mdo sde): b ar du bstan te phyir 'gro bar bsams nas klu'i rgyal pos kyang yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che bkrol te phul nas skyes bu chen po yi dam la shin tu brtan pa khyod gdon mi
371b5(mdo sde): za bar 'tshang rgya'o/ /nam mngon par sangs rgyas pa na bdag kyang khyod kyi nye gnas bgyi'o/ /zhes smras pa dang / de bzhin du gyur cig ces smras so/ /nor bu rin po che 'di la
371b6(mdo sde): mthu stobs ci yod ces dris na/ nor bu 'di ni/ dpag tshad bzhi stong kho ra khor yug tu ci 'dod pa thams cad char bzhin du 'bebs so/ /zhes smras so/ /byang chub sems
371b7(mdo sde): dpa' yang 'di snyam du rin po che 'di mthu stobs che mod kyi/ bdag gi bsam pa sgrub nus pa ma yin no/ /snyam nas klu'i rgyal pos mkhar gyi sgo'i phyi rol tu byang chub sems
372a1(mdo sde): dpa' bskyal to/ /de nas yang song song ba las rgyang ma nas gser gyi mkhar rab tu 'tsher ba zhig mthong nas byang chub sems dpa' de'i drung du
372a2(mdo sde): song nas phyin pa dang / mkhar de yang 'obs rim pa bdun gyis bskor te/ 'obs kyi nang na sbrul gdug pas yongs su gang ba mthong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' yang
372a3(mdo sde): byams pa'i sems bskyed pas sbrul gyi gdug pa zhi nas de la brdzis te song ngo / /mkhar de la'ang klu gnyis shig 'khyil te mgo sgo'i phyi rol tu bstan nas nyal ba/ byang chub
372a4(mdo sde): s ems dpa' mthong nas mgo bteg ste gdug pa 'byin pa las byang chub sems dpas snying brtse zhing byams pa'i sems bskyed pas gdug pa zhi nas de'i mgo la brdzis
372a5(mdo sde): te mkhar gyi nang du song ngo / /mkhar de'i nang na klu'i rgyal pos rin po che'i gzhal med khang nas byang chub sems dpa' rgyang ma nas mthong ste 'di snyam du bdag gi gnas
372a6(mdo sde): 'di ni| 'obs rim pa bdun gyis bskor te/ 'obs kyi nang na sbrul gdug pas gang bas klu dang gnod sbyin ma gtogs par gzhan gang yang 'ong ba'i thugs mi thub
372a7(mdo sde): na| mi 'di su yin/ gang nas 'ongs snyam ngo mtshar du bzung ste rgyang ma nas bsu nas bsti stang dang bcas pas phyag 'tshal te rin po che'i gdan la 'dug tu bcug
372b1(mdo sde): go / de nas kha zas ro brgya dang ldan pa rnam pa sna tshogs sbyar te phul nas kha zas zos pa'i 'og tu khyod su zhig /gang nas 'ongs zhes dris so/ /de la byang chub sems dpas bdag
372b2(mdo sde): ni| 'dzam bu'i gling nas mchis te/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can dag bsod nams chung bas/ nor dang zas dang skom gyi phyir gcig la gcig rnam pa sna tshogs pas
372b3(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gsod de/ mi dge ba bcu'i las rdzogs par byed pas tshe 'phos ma thag tu ngan song gsum du ltung zhing sdug bsngal mang po myong bar 'gyur bas/ bdag ni/ de dag
372b4(mdo sde): la snying brtse ste mgon bya ba'i phyir rgyal po chen po khyod la yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che slong du 'ongs so/ /klu'i rgyal pos smras pa/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che ni/ rnyed
372b5(mdo sde): par sla ba ma yin te/ skyes bu khyod bdag la re ste 'ongs na/ bdag gi gnas 'dir zla ba bzhi zhig 'dug ste bdag cag gi mchod pa bzhes na/ nor bu rin po che yang
372b6(mdo sde): dbul lo/ /zhes byas pa dang / byang chub sems dpas kyang de bzhin du bgyi'o/ /zhes smras nas/ klu'i rgyal pos zla ba bzhi'i bar du kha zas ro brgya dang ldan pa rnam pa
372b7(mdo sde): sna tshogs sbyar te phul nas rol mo mang pos kyang mchod do/ /de la byang chub sems dpas chos kyi rnam grangs rgya cher phye zhing bstan pas klu'i rgyal po rab tu dga' ste klu
373a1(mdo sde): gzhan dang / gnod sbyin gzhan la mi ltos par yo byad thams cad kyang yid bzhin du sbyar to/ /de lta bu'i tshul du zla ba bzhi byas nas byang chub
373a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'gro bar chas pa dang / klu'i rgyal pos gtsug phud nas yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che bkrol te byang chub sems dpa' la phul nas skyes bu chen po yi dam la
373a3(mdo sde): brtan pa khyod gdon mi za bar 'tshang rgya'o/ /nam mngon par sangs rgyas pa na bdag kyang nye gnas mchog tu gyur te bsnyen bkur byed par shog cig ces smon lam btab bo/ /
373a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpas kyang de bzhin du gyur cig ces smras nas nor bu rin po che 'di la mthu stobs ji tsam zhig yod ces dris so/ /klu'i rgyal pos smras pa/ nor bu rin po che
373a5(mdo sde): 'di ni| dpag tshad brgyad stong khor khor yug tu rin po che char bzhin du 'bebs te/ ci 'dod pa thams cad 'bebs so/ /zhes smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
373a6(mdo sde): gdod dga' nas 'di snyam du 'dzam bu gling gi sa khyon ni/ dpag tshad bdun stong las med de/ nor bu rin po che 'dis ni/ bdag gi re ba skong ngo snyam bsams nas snga
373a7(mdo sde): phyir rnyed pa'i rin po che gsum char gos kyi mtha' mar phur te mkhar gyi sgor byung ba dang / klu'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pas bskyal nas so sor dong ngo / /byang chub
373b1(mdo sde): sems dpas pha zad cig tu phyin nas nor bu rin po che rnams lag tu thogs nas 'di skad ces smon lam btab bo/ /nor bu 'di yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che yin yang dag
373b2(mdo sde): na| bdag nam mkha' la 'phur bar gyur cig ces smras so/ /de skad ces smras ma thag tu nam mkha' la 'phur te rgya mtsho'i bgegs las thar nas rgya mtsho'i ngogs su phyin
373b3(mdo sde): par gyur te/ de na cung zad bsti zhing ngal sos pa'i mal du gnyid kyis log pa dang / de'i tshe rgya mtsho'i klu bran rnams 'di skad ces bgros so/ /rgya mtsho 'di na nor bu rin po che
373b4(mdo sde): 'di gsum las med de/ gsum char mi 'dis khyer gyi/ nor bu 'di ni/ yon tan dang ldan pas bdag cag la yang dgos kyi phyir brku'o/ /zhes bgros nas byang chub sems
373b5(mdo sde): dpa' gnyid kyis log pa'i tshe yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che klu rnams kyis phyir brkus so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sad nas bltas na/ nor bu rin po che med pas 'di snyam
373b6(mdo sde): du bsams so/ /'ad ni/ gdon mi za bar rgya mtsho'i klus brkus kyi/ bdag gis mthu ci yod pas rgya mtsho'i chu bcus te bskam par bya'o snyam bsams te nor bu phyir ma
373b7(mdo sde): t hob kyi bar du lag pa stong par phyir mi 'gro'o snyam yi dam bcas nas rgya mtsho'i ngogs su song ste rus sbal gyi khog pa zhig blangs nas lag pa gnyis kyis rgya mtsho'i chu bcus
374a1(mdo sde): so| |de'i tshe na rgya mtsho'i lhas de'i bsam pa shes nas de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgya mtsho 'di ni/ gting zab cing yangs te/ dpag tshad stong
374a2(mdo sde): phrag sum brgya sum cu yod pa/ gal te 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad log kyang rgya mtsho skam par byed mi nus na/ khyod gcig pus nus pa lta ci smos te/ don med do/ /
374a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ mi gcig gi snying nas las byas na/ ci yang mi 'grub pa med de/ bdag gi rin po che rnyed pa des 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa dang / bde
374a4(mdo sde): ba bya bar bsams te/ de'i bsod nams kyis mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de la sems ma zhum na/ ci'i phyir rgya mtsho 'di skam par mi nus zhes smras so/ /de'i
374a5(mdo sde): t she na lha khyab 'jug la sogs pas rgyang ma nas byang chub sems dpa' gcig pu lus yid mthun par rgya mtsho'i chu bcus te 'gro ba mang pos don du dka' ba byed pa mthong
374a6(mdo sde): nas de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' la bstang ngo snyam bsams te gcig nas gcig tu sbran nas thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i drung du lhags te/ byang chub sems
374a7(mdo sde): dpa' snod kyis chu 'chu ba mthong nas lha de dag thams cad so so'i gos phud de chur smyugs nas lan gcig smyugs te phyir phyung bas/ rgya mtsho'i chu dpag tshad bzhi bcu
374b1(mdo sde): bri'o| |yang lan gnyis smyugs pas dpag tshad brgyad cu bri'o/ /lan gsum smyugs pas dpag tshad brgya nyi shu bri nas klu de dag 'jigs skrag ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i drung
374b2(mdo sde): du lhags nas 'di skad du thong zhig / rgya mtsho'i chu skam par ma byed cig ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpas btang ngo / /de nas klu rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'
374b3(mdo sde): la khyod kyi nor bu rin po che 'di ci zhig tu dgos/ smras pa/ sems can la phan pa'i don du dgos so/ /glus smras pa/ sems can la phan pa'i don du dgos na/ rgya mtsho'i
374b4(mdo sde): nang na yang sems can mang du yod na/ ci'i phyir bskur zhes smras so/ /smras pa/ rgya mtsho'i nang na gnas pa yang sems can yin mod kyi/ de la phongs pa'i sdug bsngal
374b5(mdo sde): med do| |'dzam bu gling gi sems can dag ni/ nor gyi phyir gcig gis gcig la rnam par 'tshe zhing gnod pa byed de/ mi dge ba bcu rdzogs par byed pas tshe 'phos nas
374b6(mdo sde): kun sems can dmyal bar skye ste/ bdag ni/ de dag la snying brtse ba'i phyir rin po che 'di dgos so/ /zhes smras pa dang / klu rnams kyis nor bu rin po che phyung ste slar phul
374b7(mdo sde): lo| |rgya mtsho'i lhas byang chub sems dpa' do ltar brtson 'grus la brtan pa mthong nas 'di ni/ gdon mi za bar 'tshang rgya'o snyam sems te/ nam mngon par sangs rgyas
375a1(mdo sde): pa na bdag kyang nye gnas kyi mchog tu gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas rin po che phyir thob nas steng gi nam
375a2(mdo sde): mkha' la 'phur te gnas su 'ongs nas sngar gyi tshong pa grogs po rnams yod dam/ bde bar phyin tam zhes dris so/ /tshong pa grogs po dag bde bar phyin nas de
375a3(mdo sde): dag gcig la gcig dga' nas grogs po rnams kyis ngo mtshar ya mtshan du bzung ngo / /de nas bram ze ka pi li'i sgor song nas byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho nas
375a4(mdo sde): phyir log go / zhes thos nas thams cad kyis sgor bsu ste rab tu dga' nas tshong ba grogs po rnams dang bcas pa la dga' ston chen po byas so/ /de'i tshe byang chub
375a5(mdo sde): sems dpas rin po che thogs te khyim du 'ongs pa dang / bram ze de'i bang mdzod thams cad yongs su gang bar gyur to/ /de nas bram ze ka pi lis rin po che sna tshogs
375a6(mdo sde): k yis bu mo brgyan nas rin po che'i chu snod bskur te byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang rkang lag bkrus nas bu mo'i lag pa nas bzung ste byang chub sems dpa' la
375a7(mdo sde): gtad| byang chub sems dpas kyang bzhes nas bram ze rab tu dga' ste bu mo'i g.yog tu bu mo lnga brgya dang / glang po che lnga brgya yang rin po ches brgyan te rol mo
375b1(mdo sde): byas nas byang chub sems dpa' la brdzangs so/ /de'i tshe na sbyin pa chen po'i pha ma bu dang dral ba'i 'og tu rtag tu dus pas/ pha ma gnyis ka'i mig ldongs par gyur te/
375b2(mdo sde): bu rgya mtsho nas log pa dang pha ma phrad nas bus pha ma la phyag 'tshal te lag pa nas 'jus te bu yin par rtogs so/ /sbyin pa chen po/ khyod kyis nged por te song ba'i
375b3(mdo sde): 'og tu mig kyang ldongs so/ /khyod rgya mtshor song song nas ci rnyed ces dris pa dang / sbyin pa chen pos nor bu rin po che pa'i lag tu byin te/ bdag gis 'di rnyed do/ /
375b4(mdo sde): zhes smras nas phas lag tu blangs te bsnams nas 'di lta bu'i rdo ba ni/ nga'i mdzod na sngon yang mang du yod na/ 'di ltar nyon mongs pa dang bsdo ci dgos zhes smras
375b5(mdo sde): s o| |de nas byang chub sems dpas nor bu phyir blangs te pha ma'i mig phyis pa tsam gyis ji ltar rlung drag pos sprin bus pa bzhin du pha ma gnyis kyi mig kyang sngar bas
375b6(mdo sde): gsal bar mthong bar gyur to/ /de nas pha ma gnyis dga' ste/ 'di ni/ nor bu rin po che yin yang dag pa lta ste/ nyon mongs pa'i don yod par gyur to zhes smras
375b7(mdo sde): so| |de nas yang sbyin pa chen pos rin po che thogs te/ khyod yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che yin yang dag na/ kho bo'i pha ma'i 'og tu rin po che sna bdun gyi gdan 'byung
376a1(mdo sde): zhing / rin po che'i bla res steng khebs par shog cig ces smon lam btab ma thag tu de bzhin du grub nas rgyal po'i bang mdzod thams cad kyang
376a2(mdo sde): gang bar gyur to/ /de nas rgyal pos pho nya zhig glang po che dpag tshad brgya stong du 'gro ba zhig la bskyon te/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad la sbyin pa chen pos rgya mtsho
376a3(mdo sde): nas yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che rnyed de/ nor bu yon tan can des da ste zhag bdun na rin po che la sogs pa gos dang / zas dang / dgos pa'i yon tan thams
376a4(mdo sde): cad char bzhin du 'bebs kyi/ so so nas ci bder longs shig ces bsgrags so/ /de ltar kun du bsgrags nas sbyin pa chen po khrus byas te gos gsar pa bgos
376a5(mdo sde): n as ga la'i thung bu mnyam por rgyal mtshan btsugs te yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags nas bog phor lag tu blangs nas 'di skad ces
376a6(mdo sde): smon lam btab bo/ /'dzam bu gling gi mi dag ni/ dbul phongs pa sha stag ste/ de dag la phan gdags dgos kyi/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che yin te mi rdzun na/
376a7(mdo sde): so so nas ci dang ci dgos pa de dang de dag thams cad yid bzhin du char ltar phob cig ces smras ma thag tu phyogs bzhi nas rlung nag po g.yos nas de ma thag tu mi
376b1(mdo sde): gtsang ba'i nyal nyil thams cad phyags te char zim bu mi drag pa zhig bab nas rdul mi 'thul bar byas pa'i 'og tu thog mar bza' ba dang / btung ba ro brgya dang ldan pa rnam pa sna
376b2(mdo sde): tshogs char bzhin du bab bo/ /de nas 'bru rnams char bzhin du bab bo/ /de nas gos char bzhin du bab bo/ /de nas rin po che char bzhin du bab ste/ 'dzam bu'i gling ni/ rin po
376b3(mdo sde): che'i phung pos yongs su gang nas rin po che dag sog ma'am/ gyo mo lta bur byas te byang chub sems dpas de ltar kun chog par byas nas 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la 'di skad
376b4(mdo sde): zhes bsgo'o/ /'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can dag ni/ gos dang / zas dang / nor gyi phyir gcig la gcig gsod cing rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gtses pas sdig pa mi dge ba'i
376b5(mdo sde): chos 'ba' zhig byed de/ tshe'i dus byas nas ngan song gsum du lhung ste mun pa nas mun par 'gro bas bdag ni/ de dag la snying brtse ba'i phyir rgya mtsho'i bgegs dang / nyon mongs
376b6(mdo sde): pa mang du khyed du bsad de/ khyed rnams bde bar bya ba'i phyir rgya mtsho nas nor bu rin po che dag blangs nas da khyed kun cis kyang mi brel te bde bar gyur gyi/ khyed rnams dge ba
376b7(mdo sde): bcu'i las kyi lam la lus dang / ngag dang / yid bsdus te brtson par gyis shig ces thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgo nas bstan cing bskul to/ /de ltar bstan cing bskul te
377a1(mdo sde): dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la nan tan byed du bcug pas/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi de dag tshe 'phos nas mtho ris gyi lhar skyes so/ /de'i tshe de'i dus
377a2(mdo sde): na de'i pha bram ze n+ya gro d+ha ni/ da ltar nga'i yab zas gtsang ma yin no/ /de'i mar gyur pa ni/ da ltar nga'i yum lha mdzes yin no/ /sbyin pa chen po ni/ nga nyid yin no/ /dngul gyi
377a3(mdo sde): mkhar na 'dug pa'i klu de ni/ shA ri'i bu yin no/ /bai DUR+ya'i mkhar na 'dug pa'i klu de ni/ mau gal yan yin no/ /gser gyi mkhar na 'dug pa'i klu de ni/ kun dga' bo
377a4(mdo sde): yin no| |rgya mtsho'i lha de ni/ ma 'gags pa yin no/ /kun dga' bo 'di klu'i rgyal po byed pa na yang nga la bsnyen bkur byas te dus la mkhas/ da ltar gyi bar du yang dus
377a5(mdo sde): la mkhas kyi/ 'dod pa gsum yang yid bzhin du gnang ngo / /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / kun dga' bo dga' mgu rangs nas pus mo'i lha ngas sa la btsugs te bdag gis
377a6(mdo sde): nam mtsho'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur bgyi'o/ /zhes gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas 'khor mang po rnams la la ni/
377a7(mdo sde): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa nas dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu'i bar du thob po/ /la la ni/ rang sangs rgyas su gyur/ la la ni/ bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed
377b1(mdo sde): do| |la la ni/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob nas rjes su yi rang ste mngon par dga'o/ /sbyin pa chen po rgya mtshor zhugs pa'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o// //rgyal po me long
377b2(mdo sde): gdong gi le'u/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab n+ya gro d+ha'i tshal na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa dang / brgya
377b3(mdo sde): byin la sogs pas bskor cing bzhugs pa las/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshon dang / dpe byad dang / gser gyi mdog lta bu'i sku la 'khor mang po thams cad ngo mtshar du
377b4(mdo sde): 'dzin te bstod cing bsngags so/ /de ltar bcom ldan 'das 'khor mang po las 'phags te thams cad kyi mchog gtso bor gyur pas/ dge slong dag the tshom du gyur nas
377b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ da ltar 'di 'ba' zhig tu 'khor kun las 'phags te/ mchog gtso bor gyur pa ma yin gyi/ sngon
377b6(mdo sde): 'das pa'i dus na yang 'di dag kun las 'phags te gtso bor gyur to/ /de nas dge slong dag gis sngon ji ltar gtso bor gyur pa bstan par gsol pa dang de la bcom
377b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sngon 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med/ dpag tu med/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i pha rol na 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rgyal
378a1(mdo sde): po chen po rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong la dbang byed pa zhig byung ste/ de la bu ni/ lnga brgya yod do/ /dus phyi zhig na btsun mo la bu zhig btsas te/ lus
378a2(mdo sde): gser gyi kha dog can skra mthon mthing lta bu lag mthil na 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa'i mtshan yod pa/ rkang pa g.yon gyi mthil na rta'i ri mo yod pa/ rkang pa g.yas kyis
378a3(mdo sde): mthil na glang po che'i ri mo yod pa/ bsod nams dang mtshan du ldan pa zhig btsas te/ ming yang me long gdong zhes bya bar btags so/ /rgyal po chen po de nad kyis btab
378a4(mdo sde): ste tshe'i dus byed du nye ba na blon po rnams kyis sras 'di rnams kyi nang na rgyal tshab tu gang gzhug / rgyal po'i dbang gang la bskur zhes zhus pa dang / rgyal po des yon tan
378a5(mdo sde): dang mtshan rnam pa 'di bcu dang ldan na/ rgyal por chug la dbang skur cig ces bsgo'o/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lhas kyi mdog gser lta bu la skra mthon mthing du
378a6(mdo sde): 'dug pa dang / lag pa gnyis kyi mthil na 'khor lo'i mtshan yod pa dang / rkang pa g.yas kyi mthil na glang po che'i ri mo yod pa dang / rkang pa g.yon pa'i mthil na rta'i
378a7(mdo sde): ri mo yod pa dang / rgyal po'i gos gon na lus dang 'tsham zhing mi che mi chung ba dang / rgyal po'i stan la 'dug na gzi brjid dang mthur ldan pa dang / rgyal phran rnams
378b1(mdo sde): kyis bkur sti rim gro cher byed de/ btsun mo dang / pho brang slas rnams kyang de la dga' zhing phyag byed pa dang / lha rnams kyi rten du khrid na lha rnams kyis phyir phyag byed pa dang /
378b2(mdo sde): yon tan dang bsod nams kyi mthus rin po che sna bdun gyi char 'bebs shing thams cad kyi yid tshim par byed pa dang / btsun mo chen mo las btsas pa dang bcu ste/ yon tan
378b3(mdo sde): 'di dag dang ldan na/ rgyal por dbang skur cig ces bsgos nas mi rtag pa mngon sum du gyur te tshe 'phos so/ /de nas rgyal bu dang blon po rnams 'dus te rgyal bu'i nor gi tshe ba
378b4(mdo sde): nas bsngar gyis yon tan bcu gang la yod pa brtags na/ rgyal bu gzhan thams cad ni/ lus gser lta bu'i mdog can ma yin/ skra mthon mthing du 'dug pa ma yin/ lag pa'i
378b5(mdo sde): mthil na 'khor lo'i mtshan yod pa ma yin/ rkang ba'i mthil na glang po che dang rta'i ri mo yod pa ma yin/ rgyal po'i gos dang 'tsham pa ma yin/ rgyal po'i gdan la bzhag na sdangs
378b6(mdo sde): pa ltar 'greng bar gyur/ rgyal phran dang blon po rnams bsti stang dang phyag mi byed de/ btsun mo dang pho brang slas rnams dga' ba dang phyag bya ba ma yin/ lha'i rten du khrid na lha
378b7(mdo sde): rnams kyis phyag bya ba ma yin/ rin po che'i char 'bebs par nus pa ma yin/ btsun mo chen mo'i sras kyang ma yin te/ rgyal bu lnga brgya las mtshan gcig tsam dang ldan pa
379a1(mdo sde): 'ga' yang ma byung ste/ sras kyi nang gi tha chung 'ba' zhig lus gser gyi mdog can la/ skra mthon mthing gi mdog lta bu/ lag pa gnyis 'khor

384a7(mdo sde): 'di ltar nyon mongs shing sdug ces dris so/ /de dag las kha cig ni/ 'di skad du/ bdag cag la pha ma dang / phu nu dang / bu smad dang / gnyen bshes ma mchis pas
384b1(mdo sde): sdug go / zhes zer ro/ /de la kha cig ni/ bdag cag yun ring du nad kyis btab pas mi sos te dug go /zhes zer ro/ /de la kha cig ni/ bdag cag bag ma byas pas chom
384b2(mdo sde): pos bcom ste ci yang mi bdog pas slong mo byed do/ /zhes zer ro/ /dge don gyis de skad ces smras pa thos nas mchi ma dku ste song ngo / /de nas yang ya zad cig na shan pa dag
384b3(mdo sde): cig srog chags bsad nas bags pa bshu ba dang / bsnyal gtubs bdag mthong ngo / /dge don gyis e ma'o 'di dag ci byed ces dris pa na/ bdag cag gi pha mes rgyud kyis 'di
384b4(mdo sde): 'dra ba'i gsod pa'i las byed de/ 'di ma byas na mi 'tsho'o/ /zhes zer ro/ /de la dge don ngo mtshar du gyur nas lta mi 'dod par song ngo / /de nas yang pha zad phyin pa dang zhing pa
384b5(mdo sde): dag cig zhing rmos te/ zhing rmos pa'i shul na srin bu mang du byung ba la bya mang po dang / sprul gdug pa dag 'thu zhing za ba mthong nas 'di dag ci byed ces dris pa na/ bdag cag
384b6(mdo sde): ni| zhing rmos te sa rlogs pa'i shul du sa bon btab na phyis mang du skyes te/ des 'tshe zhing rgyal po'i dpya yang 'bul lo/ /zhes zer ro/ /dge don de la yang ngo mtshar du
384b7(mdo sde): gyur nas pha zad song ba dang / rngon pa bya rgya bres pa dang / rnyi btsugs nas bya rnams bshor ba dang / sems can dag bya rgya dang / rnyis zin nas lus rdeb cing 'then kyang ma
385a1(mdo sde): shor te| snying rje ba'i skad phyung nas shin tu 'jigs skrag pa dag mthong nas khyod ci byed ces dris na/ bdag cag kyang rgyud kyis 'di 'dra ba'i gsod
385a2(mdo sde): pa'i las byed pas 'tsho'o/ /zhes zer ro/ /dge don gyis de skad ces smras pa thos nas shin tu yi mug ste yang pha zad song ba dang / nya ba dag nya rgyas nya bcus nas mang du zin
385a3(mdo sde): te thang bu la phung por spungs nas da dung yang 'gul ba dag mthong nas 'di dag ci byed ces dris na/ bdag cag kyang rgyud kyis las gzhan mi byed kyi/ 'di ltar nya bshor
385a4(mdo sde): zhing 'tsho bar byed do/ /zhes zer ro/ /dge don gyis 'di lta bu dag mthong nas 'di snyam du bsams so/ /sems can 'di dag ni/ dbul phongs pas bgo ba dang bza'
385a5(mdo sde): ba'i phyir 'di lta bu'i kha na ma tho ba'i las gsod pa la sogs pa byed de/ 'di dag ni/ tshe 'phos ma thag tu ngan song gsum du ltung ste mun pa nas mun par 'gro zhing thar
385a6(mdo sde): pa'i dus med do snyam du bsams nas phyir khyim du 'ongs te nyin mtshan du de sems shing mi dga' nas pha'i drung du song ste pha la yab/ bdag la gsol pa zhig mchis
385a7(mdo sde): kyi| gnong zhig ces smras so/ /phas kyang bu/ khyod ci zer/ khyod smras pa bzhin du bya'o/ /zhes smras so/ /yab/ bdag sngon phyi rol tu 'chag tu mchis pa las mi mang po
385b1(mdo sde): gos dang zas kyi phyir thams cad nyon mongs te/ gcig la gcig gsod pa dang / rdzun dang / dbang za ba dang / mi dge ba'i las rnam pa sna tshogs bgyid pa mthong nas de dag la
385b2(mdo sde): sbyin pa bgyi bar bsams kyi/ yab kyi bang mdzod chen po las brel cing phongs pa dag gi phyir yid bzhin du spyod du gnong zhig /phas smras pa/ ngas rin po che dang / bang mdzod mang
385b3(mdo sde): du bsags pa thams cad khyod kyi phyir byas par zad na/ ci'i phyir khyod zer ba bzhin du mi nyan zhes smras so/ /de nas dge don gyis phas gnang ba'i lung thob nas yul mi thams cad
385b4(mdo sde): la dge don ni/ sbyin pa chen po byed kyi/ thams cad 'dus shing shog cig ces bsgrags so/ /de'i tshe na dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / dbul zhing phongs pa mgon med pa dang / nad
385b5(mdo sde): pa la sogs te/ grong khyer gyi phyi rol na lam thog thag tu gang ngo / /de dag kyang dpag tshad brgya dang / nyis brgya dang / sum brgya dang / bzhi brgya dang / lnga brgya dang / dpag tshad
385b6(mdo sde): stong gi lam nas 'ongs kha cig ni/ dpag tshad nyis stong / sum stong / bzhi stong / lnga stong dang / dpag tshad khri'i bar nas lhags te sprin bzhin du 'dus nas thams cad la yid
385b7(mdo sde): bzhin du sbyin pa ni/ gos 'dod pa la gos/ zas 'dod pa la zas rin po che gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+ya dang / mu sar gal ba dang / bzhon pa dang / theg pa dang / khyogs
386a1(mdo sde): dang / skyed mos tshal dang / zhing dang rkang 'gro la sogs te yid bzhin du sbyin par byas so/ /de ltar sbyin pa la zhugs te yun ring zhig lon pa dang /
386a2(mdo sde): bang mdzod sum cha gcig zad nas mdzod srung gis rgyal po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /sras kyis bang mdzod las sbyin pa bgyis nas sum cha ni zad pas/ sum gnyis tsam
386a3(mdo sde): las ma lus na/ phan tshun du 'drul ba'i skyes dang / tshong zong ci las bgyi dgongs shig ces smras so/ /nga ni/ sras 'di la byams pas ngo mi ldog gis /bang mdzod stongs kyang
386a4(mdo sde): bla'o| |zhes smras so/ /de nas yang ring zhig lon pa dang bang mdzod sum gnyis ni/ zad/ sum cha tsam lus pa dang / mdzod srung gis yang rgyal po la da ni/ bang mdzod sum gnyis
386a5(mdo sde): tsam ni zad/ sum cha tsam las ma lus na/ phan tshun skyes bskur ba dang / tshong zong ci las bgyi zhes smras so/ /rgyal pos de la bsgo ba/ nga'i sras sdug ches te ngo mi ldog
386a6(mdo sde): pas smra mi phod kyi/ khyod kyis thabs ci legs su byos la brel cing mi khom pa ltar bsnyad thogs shig /mdzod srung gis rgyal po las lung thob nas mdzod sgo bcad de don
386a7(mdo sde): gnyer du song ngo / /de nas slong ba dag dge don gyi thad du lhags nas bar 'ga' ni/ mdzod srung mi rnyed de mdzod sgo mi phyed/ gal te mdzod srung 'ongs na yang yid bzhin du
386b1(mdo sde): mi ster bas/ dge don gyis 'di snyam du bsams so/ /'di ltar gyur pa 'di ni/ mdzod srung gis thugs mi thub pas yab kyi man ngag 'ongs kyi/ yong yang bus ni/ pha'i mdzod
386b2(mdo sde): stongs par bya ba mi rigs kyi/ bdag gis da thabs ci zhig byas na rin po che yid bzhin du rnyed de/ skye bo mang po la phan 'dogs par 'gyur snyam bsams nas mi dag la 'di
386b3(mdo sde): skad ces dris so/ /'jig rten na las ci zhig byas na nor dbyig mang du rnyed cing zad mi shes par 'gyur zhes dris pa dang / kha cig ni/ zhing cher rmos na nor dbyig mang por
386b4(mdo sde): 'gyur zhes zer ro/ kha cig ni/ rkang 'gro spel te spogs byas na nor mang du rnyed do/ /zhes zer ro/ /kha cig ni/ lam ring por tshong spogs byas na nor mang du rnyed ces zer ro/
386b5(mdo sde): kha cig ni/ rgya mtshor zhugs te nor bu rin po che blangs na rin po che mang du 'gyur ro/ /zhes zer ro/ /dge don gyis de dag gis smras pa thos nas zhing rmo ba dang / rkang 'gro spel
386b6(mdo sde): ba dang / lam ring por tshong la 'gro ba ni/ nga'i cha ma yin gyi/ rgya mtshor 'jug pa 'ba' zhig nga'i cha yin no/ /zhes smras nas rgya mtshor 'jug go snyam du bsams te pha ma la
386b7(mdo sde): 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag ni/ rgya mtsho nas rin po che mang du blangs te dbul phongs pa la sbyin pa yid bzhin du bgyi'o/ /bdag rgya mtshor rin po che len du mchir gnong
387a1(mdo sde): zhig ces smras so/ /de'i pha mas de skad ces smras pa thos nas 'khams te bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jig rten na dbul phongs pa dag ni/ blo
387a2(mdo sde): med de| lus srog dang bsngos nas 'gro bar byed do/ /khyod cis phongs na de lta bur sems te/ khyod sbyin pa byed 'dod na khyim na yod pa'i nor thams cad sbyin par khyos
387a3(mdo sde): shig / rgya mtshor ni/ 'gror mi rung ste rgya mtsho'i nang na chu rlabs dang / dpa' klong 'khyil pa dang / chu srin dang / klu gdug pa dang / srin mo dang / ri chu'i mdog can
387a4(mdo sde): la sogs pa shin tu yang ba'i bgegs mang du yod pas thar par dka' na/ khyod cis phongs te srog dang bsngo bar byed/ /'di la ni/ nyan pa med kyi/ ma sems par 'dug
387a5(mdo sde): cig ces bsgo'o/ /dge don gyis de skad ces bsgo ba thos nas bsam pa bzhin dum grub pas yi dam bcas te/ bsam pa 'di ma grub kyi bar du pha ma'i mdun du sa
387a6(mdo sde): la khas bub tu nyal te mi ldang ngo snyam bsams nas yab yum gyis mkhyen par mdzod cig / bdag ni/ bsam pa bzhin ma grub kyi bar du khas bub tu nyal ba 'di las
387a7(mdo sde): mi ldang ngo / /zhes smras so/ /de nas pha ma mi dga' ste gnyen bshes dang bgros nas rgya mtsho'i nang na dgegs yang ba mang du yod pa'i gtam yang byas/ bdag kyang
387b1(mdo sde): rmongs pas lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du lha kun la mchod de/ khyod lta zhig nga'i bur skyes na nged mdor bar zan zo zhig ces zhag gcig zhag gnyis nas zhag drug gi bar du tshig
387b2(mdo sde): rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gros btab kyang ma nyan te/ sngar ji skad smras pa las ma ldog go /pha ma sdangs nas yang 'di skad ces bgros so/ /bdag gi bu 'di thog ma nas da tsam
387b3(mdo sde): gyi bar du bya ba bsam pa mthar ma grub kyi bar du mi gtong bas/ rgya mtshor btang na gal te na phyir ldog kyang srid kyi/ ma btang na zhag bdun lon nas 'phral du bye bral
387b4(mdo sde): byed de| da ni/ gtang dgos so snyam bgros nas bu'i drung du song ste lag pa nas bzung nas bu longs la zan zo zhig /yid bzhin du 'gro bar gnang ngo / /zhes smras pa dang
387b5(mdo sde): dge don yang langs te bza' ba zos/ btung ba 'thungs so/ /de nas phyi rol tu byung ste mi mang po la kho bo rgya mtshor rin po che len du 'gro'o/ /khyed su 'gror dga' ba rnams
387b6(mdo sde): kyang 'grogs te 'dong gi / ded dpon yang kho bos bya la/ yo byad kyang kho bos sbyar ro/ /zhes bgrags so/ /de'i tshe na yul de na tshong pa lnga brgya snyed kyis bdag cag kyang
387b7(mdo sde): rgya mtshor rin po che len du mchi'o/ /zhes thams cad 'dus nas chas so/ /de'i tshe yul de na tshong ba ded dpon rgan po zhig sngon chad kyang rgya mtshor lan du ma phyin pa zhig
388a1(mdo sde): yod de| rgyal bu nyid de'i gan du song nas 'di skad ces smras so/ kho bo rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i sa mkhan du 'gro dgos kyi/ khyod kyang chas shig
388a2(mdo sde): ces bsgo ba dang / ded dpon gyis bdag ni/ rgas 'khogs pa'i steng du mig gnyis kyis kyang mi mthong bas 'gro mi nus so/ /zhes smras so/ /de nas rgyal bu pha'i thang
388a3(mdo sde): du song ste rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /ded dpon rgan po zhig mchis pa sngon chad kyang rgya mtshor lan du ma zhig phyin te rgya mtsho'i rgyus mchis kyi/ bdag rgya mtshor
388a4(mdo sde): mchis pa'i sa mkhan du bka' stsol cig ces gsol pa dang / rgyal po nyid ded dpon long ba'i gan du song nas ded dpon long ba la 'di skad ces bsgo'o/ /rgyal bu
388a5(mdo sde): rgya mtshor 'gro 'dod de/ nged kyis 'gror mi rung ba'i gros re lta zhig btab na ma nyan gyi/ rgyal bu rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i sa mkhan du khyod song zhig ces bka' stsal pa dang /
388a6(mdo sde): ded dpon gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bdag rgas 'khogs pa'i steng du mig gnyis kyang long mod kyi/ da rgyal pos bka' stsal pa na bka' mi gcog go/ zhes gsol
388a7(mdo sde): to| |de nas rgyal po pho brang du 'ongs nas nga'i bu dang rgya mtshor 'gro phod pa su yod ces dris pa dang / rgyal bu sdig don yang bdag phu bo'i g.yog tu mchi'o/ /zhes gsol to/ /
388b1(mdo sde): rgyal pos bsam pa/ gzhan song ba bas nu bo song na phan snyam nas nu bo yang 'gror gnang ngo / /de nas rgyal bus gser srang sum stong zhig phyung ste srang stong ni/ gru'i zong du byas/
388b2(mdo sde): srang nyis stong ni/ 'phral du dgos pa'i yo byad du sbyar te chas nas rgyal po dang btsun mo la sogs pa thams cad kyis bskyal to/ /de nas rgya mtsho'i ngogs su phyin nas grur zhugs
388b3(mdo sde): te thag pa bdun gyis brtod nas rlung phyogs dang sbyar te 'gro ba'i tshong pa rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgya mtsho'i nang na bgegs rnam pa sna tshogs yod de/ snga phyir 'dong ba ni/
388b4(mdo sde): rab tu yang mang na/ phyir 'khor ba ni/ nyung rab bo/ /de las the tshom za ba la de na phyir dengs shig /gal te lus dang srog la mi lta/ pha ma dang / bu dang / chung ma dang / gnyen
388b5(mdo sde): bshes dag la yang ma chags te rin po che'i gling du phyin nas phyir yang bde bar 'khor na/ bu tsha rabs bdun tshun chad nor gyis mi brel bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bsgrags nas thag
388b6(mdo sde): pa gcig bcad do/ /de bzhin du nyi ma bdun gyi bar du nyin re lan re de skad ces bsgos nas thag pa re re bcad de rlung phyogs su bab pa la g.yor shing bsgrengs te mgyogs khyad
388b7(mdo sde): mda' bzhin du song ngo / /de nas rin po che'i gling du phyin nas rgyal bu rin po che brtag pa la shin tu mkhas pas/ rin po che bzang ngan dang / mang nyung gi tshad kyang bstan nas
389a1(mdo sde): so so nas rin po che tshol lo/ /ded dpon dang gnyis gru chung gcig gi nang du zhugs nas tshong pa phal rnams der bor ro/ /de nas song song ba
389a2(mdo sde): las ded dpon gyis ni/ ri dkar po zhig yod pa'i rigs na mthong ngam zhes dris so/ /rgyal bus kyang de 'dra ba zhig snang ngo / /zhes smras pa dang / de ni/ dngul gyi
389a3(mdo sde): ri yin no/ /zhes zer ro/ /de nas yang song song ba las/ da ni/ ri sngon po zhig snang ba'i rigs na mthong ngam zhes dris na/ de 'dra ba zhig snang ngo / /zhes smras pa
389a4(mdo sde): dang / de ni/ bai DUR+ya'i ri yin no/ /zhes smras so/ /de nas yang song song ba las/ da ni/ ri ser po zhig snang ba'i rigs so/ /zhes dris na/ ri ser po 'dra ba zhig
389a5(mdo sde): snang ngo / /zhes smras pa dang / de ni/ gser gyi ri yin no/ /zhes smras so/ /de nas gser gyi ri'i drung du phyin te gser gyi bye ma'i steng du 'dug nas ded dpon des
389a6(mdo sde): 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag ni/ rgas zhom ste da ni/ 'gro mi phod pas/ da 'di nyid du tshe'i dus byas par 'gyur gyi/ khyod 'di nas song zhig dang / mdun na rin po
389a7(mdo sde): che sna bdun gyi mkhar zhig dang phrad pa'i rigs kyi/ gal te mkhar sgo bcad cing 'dug na/ sgo drung na rdo rje'i gtun zhig yod pa'i rigs kyi/ rdo rje'i gtun gyis mkhar
389b1(mdo sde): bsgo rdungs shig dang / nang nas lha mo lnga brgya zhig so so nas rin po che thogs te 'bul du 'ong ngo / /de la lha mo gcig cig kyang rin po che sngon po gcig thogs shing 'bul du
